trans-unit.source: Searches for the members defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> whose <see cref="T:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: 搜索为设置了 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute" /> 定义的成员。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing all default members of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 的所有默认成员的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />, if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> does not have default members.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 没有默认成员，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetDefaultMembers%2A> method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetDefaultMembers%2A>方法不返回成员按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于成员的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 成员包括属性、 方法、 字段、 事件和等等。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, if class `C<T>` has a property `P` that returns `T`, calling <xref:System.Type.GetDefaultMembers%2A> on `C<int>` returns `int P` in C# (`Property P As Integer` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果类`C<T>`都有一个属性`P`返回`T`，则调用<xref:System.Type.GetDefaultMembers%2A>上`C<int>`返回`int P`C# 中 (`Property P As Integer`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数搜索类约束的成员或成员的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: The following example obtains the default member information of `MyClass` and displays the default members.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取的默认成员信息`MyClass`并显示的默认成员。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object encompassed or referred to by the current array, pointer or reference type.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，返回当前数组、指针或引用类型包含的或引用的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object encompassed or referred to by the current array, pointer, or reference type, or <see langword="null" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is not an array or a pointer, or is not passed by reference, or represents a generic type or a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method.
trans-unit.target: 当前数组、指针或引用类型包含或引用的对象的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；如果当前 <see langword="null" /> 不是数组或指针，不是按引用传递，或者表示泛型类型或泛型方法的定义中的泛型类型或类型参数，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `null` for the <xref:System.Array> class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`null`为<xref:System.Array>类。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the `GetElementType` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用`GetElementType`方法。

trans-unit.source: The value whose name is to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其名称的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the constant that has the specified value, for the current enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前枚举类型中具有指定值的常数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the member of the current enumeration type that has the specified value, or <see langword="null" /> if no such constant is found.
trans-unit.target: 当前枚举类型中具有指定值的成员的名称；如果未找到这样的常数，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current type is not an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型不是一个枚举。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is neither of the current type nor does it have the same underlying type as the current type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 不是当前类型，也不具有与当前类型相同的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the names of the members of the current enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前枚举类型中各个成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the members of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，其中包含枚举中各个成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the return value array are sorted by the binary values (that is, the unsigned values) of the enumerated constants.
trans-unit.target: 返回值数组的元素进行排序的枚举常量的二进制值 （即，符号值）。

trans-unit.source: If the array contains enumerated constants with the same value, the order of their corresponding names is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 如果数组包含与相同的值的枚举的常数，则不指定其相应名称的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The current type is not an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型不是一个枚举。

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying type of the current enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前枚举类型的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: The underlying type of the current enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前枚举的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: By default, the underlying type of an enumeration in C# and Visual Basic is <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，C# 和 Visual Basic 中的一个枚举的基础类型是<xref:System.Int32>。

trans-unit.source: Other integer types can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 可以指定其他整数类型。

trans-unit.source: The current type is not an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型不是一个枚举。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The enumeration type is not valid, because it contains more than one instance field.
trans-unit.target: 枚举类型无效，因为它包含多个实例字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the values of the constants in the current enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前枚举类型中各个常数的值组成的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the values.
trans-unit.target: 包含值的数组。

trans-unit.source: The elements of the array are sorted by the binary values (that is, the unsigned values) of the enumeration constants.
trans-unit.target: 该数组的元素按枚举常量的二进制值（无符号值）排序。

trans-unit.source: The current type is not an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型不是一个枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific event declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明或继承的特定事件。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of an event that is declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串包含事件名称，该事件是由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明或继承的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> object representing the specified public event.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示指定的公共事件的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object representing the specified public event that is declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如找到，则为表示由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明或继承的指定公共事件的对象；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An event is considered public to reflection if it has at least one method or accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它具有至少一个方法或访问器是公共的则认为反射到公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the event is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该事件被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search includes public static and public instance events.
trans-unit.target: 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例事件。

trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the events of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> object and gets the event for a button class for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>对象，并指定事件的按钮类获取事件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of an event which is declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 字符串包含由当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明或继承的事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> object representing the specified event, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定绑定约束，返回表示指定事件的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object representing the specified event that is declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如找到，则为表示由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明或继承的指定公共事件的对象；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which events to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的事件：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public events in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public events (that is, private, internal, and protected events) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`若要在搜索中包括非公共事件 （即，私有、 内部和受保护事件）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the events declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not events that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的事件<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的事件。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: An event is considered public to reflection if it has at least one method or accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它具有至少一个方法或访问器是公共的则认为反射到公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the event is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该事件被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the events of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Type.GetEvent%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%29> method to search a type for a public or non-public event named "Click" that is not `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Type.GetEvent%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%29>方法搜索的类型的公共或非公共事件名为"单击"不是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the events that are declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明或继承的事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public events that are declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 声明或继承的所有公共事件。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> objects representing all the public events which are declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示由当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 声明或继承的所有公共事件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" />, if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> does not have public events.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.EventInfo" /> 没有默认成员，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: An event is considered public to reflection if it has at least one method or accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它具有至少一个方法或访问器是公共的则认为反射到公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the event is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该事件被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetEvents%2A> method does not return events in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetEvents%2A>方法不返回事件按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which events are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于事件的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for events that are declared or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, using the specified binding constraints.

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetEvents%2A> method does not return events in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetEvents%2A>方法不返回事件按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which events are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于事件的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which events to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的事件：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public events in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public events (that is, private, internal, and protected events) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`若要在搜索中包括非公共事件 （即，私有、 内部和受保护事件）。

trans-unit.source: Only protected and internal events on base classes are returned; private events on base classes are not returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅保护，将返回基类上的内部事件;不会返回私有基类上的事件。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the events declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not events that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的事件<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的事件。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: An event is considered public to reflection if it has at least one method or accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它具有至少一个方法或访问器是公共的则认为反射到公共事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the event is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该事件被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the events of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example obtains an array of <xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo> objects that match the specified binding flags, gets all the events for a `Button` class, and displays the event names.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取数组的<xref:System.Reflection.EventInfo>与指定的绑定标志匹配的对象获取的所有事件`Button`类，并显示事件名称。

trans-unit.source: To compile the Visual Basic example, use the following command line:
trans-unit.target: 若要编译 Visual Basic 示例，请使用下面的命令行：

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific field of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的特定字段。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the data field to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的数据字段的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the public field with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的公共字段。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the public field with the specified name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如找到，则为表示具有指定名称的公共字段的对象；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search includes public static and public instance fields.
trans-unit.target: 搜索包括公共静态和公共实例字段。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the fields of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的字段。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the `Type` object for the specified class, obtains the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> object for the field, and displays the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取`Type`对象指定的类，获取<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>字段的对象，并显示字段的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object is a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> whose <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> method has not yet been called.
trans-unit.target: 该 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象为 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" />，其 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType" /> 方法尚未被调用。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the data field to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的数据字段的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified field, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定绑定约束搜索指定字段。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the field that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的字段的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which fields to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括哪些字段：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public fields in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`若要在搜索中包含公共字段。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public fields (that is, private, internal, and protected fields) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`若要在搜索中包含非公共字段 （即，私有、 内部和受保护字段）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the fields declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not fields that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的字段<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的字段。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the fields of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的字段。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the `Type` object for the specified class, obtains the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> object for the field that matches the specified binding flags, and displays the value of the field.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取`Type`对象指定的类，获取<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>匹配指定的绑定标志，并显示字段的值的字段的对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the fields of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的字段。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public fields of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的所有公共字段。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects representing all the public fields defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 定义的所有公共字段的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" />, if no public fields are defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 定义的公共字段，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetFields%2A> method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetFields%2A>方法不返回字段按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于字段的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。
