trans-unit.source: The following example shows a use of the `GetFields()` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用`GetFields()`方法。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the fields defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定绑定约束，搜索为当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 定义的字段。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> objects representing all fields defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that match the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 表示为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 定义的匹配指定绑定约束的所有字段的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" />, if no fields are defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, or if none of the defined fields match the binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.FieldInfo" /> 定义的字段，或者如果没有一个定义的字段匹配绑定约束，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetFields%2A> method does not return fields in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetFields%2A>方法不返回字段按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which fields are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于字段的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which fields to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括哪些字段：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public fields in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`若要在搜索中包含公共字段。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public fields (that is, private, internal, and protected fields) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`若要在搜索中包含非公共字段 （即，私有、 内部和受保护字段）。

trans-unit.source: Only protected and internal fields on base classes are returned; private fields on base classes are not returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅保护，将返回基类上的内部字段;基类上的私有字段不会返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the fields declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not fields that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的字段<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的字段。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the public fields of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的公共字段。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a use of the `GetFields(BindingFlags)` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用`GetFields(BindingFlags)`方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that represent the type arguments of a closed generic type or the type parameters of a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示封闭式泛型类型的类型参数或泛型类型定义的类型参数的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that represent the type arguments of a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 表示泛型类型的类型实参的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty array if the current type is not a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型不是泛型类型，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: The array elements are returned in the order in which they appear in the list of type arguments for the generic type.
trans-unit.target: 数组元素的泛型类型的类型参数列表中出现的顺序返回。

trans-unit.source: If the current type is a closed constructed type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property returns `false`), the array returned by the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A> method contains the types that have been assigned to the generic type parameters of the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型是封闭式构造的类型 (即，<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性返回`false`)，返回的数组<xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A>方法包含已分配给泛型类型定义的泛型类型参数的类型.

trans-unit.source: If the current type is a generic type definition, the array contains the type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型是泛型类型定义，该数组包含的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: If the current type is an open constructed type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property returns `true`) in which specific types have not been assigned to all of the type parameters and type parameters of enclosing generic types or methods, the array contains both types and type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型为开放式构造的类型 (即，<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性返回`true`) 中的特定类型不已分配到的所有类型参数和类型参数的封闭式泛型类型或方法，该数组包含类型和类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> property to tell them apart.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>属性来区分它们。

trans-unit.source: For a demonstration of this scenario, see the code example for the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关此方案的演示，请参阅的代码示例<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property remarks.
trans-unit.target: 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 属性注解。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A> method to display the type arguments of a constructed type and the type parameters of its generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A>方法以显示构造的类型的类型自变量和其泛型类型定义的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: See the larger example for sample output.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅示例输出更大的示例。

trans-unit.source: The invoked method is not supported in the base class.
trans-unit.target: 基类不支持调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes must provide an implementation.
trans-unit.target: 派生类必须提供一个实现。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that represent the constraints on the current generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前泛型类型参数约束的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects that represent the constraints on the current generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前泛型类型参数上的约束的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Each constraint on a generic type parameter is expressed as a <xref:System.Type> object.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型参数上的每个约束都表示为<xref:System.Type>对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Type.IsClass%2A> property to determine whether a constraint is the base class constraint; if the property returns `false`, the constraint is an interface constraint.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Type.IsClass%2A>属性以确定约束是否是基类约束; 如果该属性返回`false`，约束为接口约束。

trans-unit.source: If a type parameter has no class constraint and no interface constraints, an empty array is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个类型参数没有类约束和接口约束，则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property remarks.
trans-unit.target: 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 属性注解。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a generic type `Test` with two type parameters that have different constraints.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例定义一个泛型类型`Test`两个类型参数具有不同的约束。

trans-unit.source: When the program executes, the constraints are examined using the <xref:System.Type.GenericParameterAttributes%2A> property and the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 程序执行时，使用检查这些约束<xref:System.Type.GenericParameterAttributes%2A>属性和<xref:System.Type.GetGenericParameterConstraints%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object is not a generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象不是泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: That is, the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsGenericParameter" /> property returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，<see cref="P:System.Type.IsGenericParameter" /> 属性将返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents a generic type definition from which the current generic type can be constructed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示可用于构造当前泛型类型的泛型类型定义的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object representing a generic type from which the current type can be constructed.
trans-unit.target: 表示可用于构造当前类型的泛型类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A generic type definition is a template from which other types can be constructed.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型定义是可从其构造其他类型的模板。

trans-unit.source: For example, from the generic type definition `G<T>` (expressed in C# syntax; `G(Of T)` in Visual Basic or `generic <typename T> ref class G` in C++) you can construct and instantiate the type `G<int>` (`G(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 例如，从泛型类型定义`G<T>`（用表示 C# 语法;`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中或`generic <typename T> ref class G`c + + 中) 构造并将其实例化类型`G<int>`(`G(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Given a <xref:System.Type> object representing this constructed type, the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A> method returns the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 给定<xref:System.Type>对象表示此构造类型，<xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>方法返回的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: If two constructed types are created from the same generic type definition, using the same type arguments, the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A> method returns the same <xref:System.Type> object for both types.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个构造的类型创建从相同的泛型类型定义，使用相同的类型实参，<xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>方法返回相同<xref:System.Type>这两种类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: If you call the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A> method on a <xref:System.Type> object that already represents a generic type definition, it returns the current <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>方法<xref:System.Type>对象已表示泛型类型定义，它将返回当前<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: An array of generic types is not itself generic.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型的数组不是泛型本身。

trans-unit.source: In the C# code `A<int>[] v;` or the Visual Basic code `Dim v() As A(Of Integer)`, the type of variable `v` is not generic.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 代码`A<int>[] v;`或 Visual Basic 代码`Dim v() As A(Of Integer)`，变量的类型`v`不是泛型。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> to determine whether a type is generic before calling <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>来确定类型是否为泛型之前调用<xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property remarks.
trans-unit.target: 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 属性注解。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of a constructed type by using ordinary instance creation and then uses the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> and <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A> methods to retrieve the constructed type and the generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例通过使用普通的实例创建创建构造类型的实例，然后使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>和<xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>方法来检索的构造的类型和泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the generic <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> type; the constructed type represents a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> of `Test` objects with string keys.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用泛型<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>类型; 构造的类型表示<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>的`Test`具有字符串键的对象。

trans-unit.source: The current type is not a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型不是泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: That is, <see cref="P:System.Type.IsGenericType" /> returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，<see cref="P:System.Type.IsGenericType" /> 返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The invoked method is not supported in the base class.
trans-unit.target: 基类不支持调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes must provide an implementation.
trans-unit.target: 派生类必须提供一个实现。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the hash code of the `System.Windows.Forms.Button` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的哈希代码`System.Windows.Forms.Button`类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific interface implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 实现或继承的特定接口。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the interface to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的接口名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For generic interfaces, this is the mangled name.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型接口，这是重整名称。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the interface with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的接口。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the interface with the specified name, implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有指定名称且由当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 实现或继承的接口的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Type> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Type>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the interface constraints and any interfaces inherited from class or interface constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数将搜索接口约束和继承的类或接口约束的所有接口。

trans-unit.source: For generic interfaces, the `name` parameter is the mangled name, ending with a grave accent (\`) and the number of type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型接口，`name`参数是重整的名称，以重音符结尾 (\`) 和类型参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: This is true for both generic interface definitions and constructed generic interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这适用于泛型接口定义和构造的泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: For example, to find `IExample<T>` (`IExample(Of T)` in Visual Basic) or `IExample<string>` (`IExample(Of String)` in Visual Basic), search for ``"IExample`1"``.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要查找`IExample<T>`(`IExample(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中) 或`IExample<string>`(`IExample(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)，搜索``"IExample`1"``。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%29> method to search the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> class for the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback> interface, and lists the methods of the interface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%29>方法搜索<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>类<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback>接口，并列出接口的方法。

trans-unit.source: The code example also demonstrates the <xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload and the <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例还演示<xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载与<xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents a type that implements the same generic interface with different type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示使用不同类型参数实现同一泛型接口的类型。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the interface to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的接口名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: For generic interfaces, this is the mangled name.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型接口，这是重整名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to ignore the case of that part of <c>name</c> that specifies the simple interface name (the part that specifies the namespace must be correctly cased).
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示对于用来指定简单接口名称的 <c>name</c> 部分（该部分指定命名空间大小写必须正确）忽略其大小写。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to perform a case-sensitive search for all parts of <c>name</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 表示对 <c>name</c> 的所有部分执行区分大小写的搜索。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the specified interface, specifying whether to do a case-insensitive search for the interface name.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，搜索指定的接口，指定是否要对接口名称执行不区分大小写的搜索。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the interface with the specified name, implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有指定名称且由当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 实现或继承的接口的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The `ignoreCase` parameter applies only to the simple interface name, not to the namespace.
trans-unit.target: `ignoreCase`参数仅适用于不到命名空间的简单接口名称。

trans-unit.source: The portion of `name` that specifies the namespace must have the correct case, or the interface will not be found.
trans-unit.target: 部分`name`，指定该命名空间必须包含正确的大小写，或将找不到该接口。

trans-unit.source: For example, the string "System.icomparable" finds the <xref:System.IComparable> interface, but the string "system.icomparable" does not.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"System.icomparable"查找在字符串<xref:System.IComparable>接口，但字符串"system.icomparable"却没有。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Type> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Type>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the interface constraints and any interfaces inherited from class or interface constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数将搜索接口约束和继承的类或接口约束的所有接口。

trans-unit.source: For generic interfaces, the `name` parameter is the mangled name, ending with a grave accent (\`) and the number of type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型接口，`name`参数是重整的名称，以重音符结尾 (\`) 和类型参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: This is true for both generic interface definitions and constructed generic interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这适用于泛型接口定义和构造的泛型接口。

trans-unit.source: For example, to find `IExample<T>` (`IExample(Of T)` in Visual Basic) or `IExample<string>` (`IExample(Of String)` in Visual Basic), search for `"IExample`1"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要查找`IExample<T>`(`IExample(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中) 或`IExample<string>`(`IExample(Of String)`在 Visual Basic 中)，搜索`"IExample`1"。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method to perform a case-insensitive search of the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> class for the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法执行不区分大小写的搜索的<xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>类<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。

trans-unit.source: The code example also demonstrates the <xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%29> method overload and the <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例还演示<xref:System.Type.GetInterface%28System.String%29>方法重载与<xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents a type that implements the same generic interface with different type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示使用不同类型参数实现同一泛型接口的类型。

trans-unit.source: The interface type to retrieve a mapping for.
trans-unit.target: 要检索其映射的接口类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns an interface mapping for the specified interface type.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定接口类型的接口映射。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the interface mapping for <paramref name="interfaceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 的接口映射的对象。

trans-unit.source: The interface map denotes how an interface is mapped into the actual members on a class that implements that interface.
trans-unit.target: 接口映射表示如何接口映射到实现该接口的类上的实际成员。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, type parameters are replaced by the appropriate type arguments in the elements of the <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，类型参数替换的元素中的适当类型自变量为<xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping>此方法返回。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A> method to determine how the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> interface maps to <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> methods, and how the <xref:System.IAppDomainSetup> interface maps to <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Type.GetInterfaceMap%2A>方法来确定如何<xref:System.IFormatProvider>接口映射到<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>方法，以及如何<xref:System.IAppDomainSetup>接口映射到<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that, because the <xref:System.IAppDomainSetup> interface defines a set of properties, the returned <xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping> object includes separate <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> objects for a property's get and set accessors.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，因为<xref:System.IAppDomainSetup>接口定义一组属性，返回<xref:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping>对象包括单独<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象的属性的 get 和 set 访问器。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> is not implemented by the current type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 未由当前类型实现。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="interfaceType" /> parameter does not refer to an interface.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 参数不引用接口。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> is a generic interface, and the current type is an array type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 是泛型接口，当前类型是数组类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="interfaceType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents a generic type parameter; that is, <see cref="P:System.Type.IsGenericParameter" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 表示泛型类型参数；即，<see cref="P:System.Type.IsGenericParameter" /> 为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The invoked method is not supported in the base class.
trans-unit.target: 基类不支持调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes must provide an implementation.
trans-unit.target: 派生类必须提供一个实现。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets all the interfaces implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 实现或继承的所有接口。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing all the interfaces implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 实现或继承的所有接口的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if no interfaces are implemented or inherited by the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有由当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 实现或继承的接口，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaces%2A> method does not return interfaces in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetInterfaces%2A>方法不返回接口按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which interfaces are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于接口的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Type> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Type>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the interface constraints and any interfaces inherited from class or interface constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数将搜索接口约束和继承的类或接口约束的所有接口。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the type of the specified class and displays all the interfaces that the type implements or inherits.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取指定的类的类型，并显示该类型实现或继承的所有接口。

trans-unit.source: To compile the Visual Basic example, use the following compiler commands:
trans-unit.target: 若要编译 Visual Basic 示例，请使用以下的编译器命令：

trans-unit.source: A static initializer is invoked and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 调用静态初始值设定项时引发了异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified members of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的指定成员。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the public members to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的公共成员名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the public members with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing the public members with the specified name, if found; otherwise, an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示具有指定名称的公共成员的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象数组（如果找到的话）；否则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search includes public static and public instance members.
trans-unit.target: 搜索范围包括公共静态和公共实例成员。

trans-unit.source: Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 成员包括属性、 方法、 字段、 事件和等等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetMember%2A> method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetMember%2A>方法不返回成员按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于成员的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: This method overload will not find class initializers (.cctor).
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载将找不到类初始值设定项 (.cctor)。

trans-unit.source: To find class initializers, use an overload that takes <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>, and specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要查找类初始值设定项，请使用采用重载<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>，并指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: You can also get the class initializer using the <xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以获取类初始值设定项使用<xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数搜索类约束的成员或成员的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型方法，不包括中的类型自变量`name`。

trans-unit.source: For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod<int>")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod<int>`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 代码`GetMember("MyMethod<int>")`搜索文本同名的成员"`MyMethod<int>`"，而不是一个名为方法`MyMethod`具有的类型的一个泛型参数`int`。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays all the members of the `String` class that start with the letter C.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的所有成员`String`以字母 C 开头的类

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the members to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的成员的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 零，返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified members, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定绑定约束搜索指定成员。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing the public members with the specified name, if found; otherwise, an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示具有指定名称的公共成员的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象数组（如果找到的话）；否则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 成员包括属性、 方法、 字段、 事件和等等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetMember%2A> method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetMember%2A>方法不返回成员按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于成员的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的成员：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`在搜索中包括非公共成员 （即，私有、 内部和受保护成员）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not members that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的成员<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的成员。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To get the class initializer (.cctor) using this method overload, you must specify ".cctor" for `name`, and <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> in Visual Basic) for `bindingAttr`.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取类初始值设定项 (.cctor) 使用此方法重载，必须指定".cctor"为`name`，和<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>在 Visual Basic 中) 为`bindingAttr`。

trans-unit.source: You can also get the class initializer using the <xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以获取类初始值设定项使用<xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数搜索类约束的成员或成员的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型方法，不包括中的类型自变量`name`。

trans-unit.source: For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod<int>")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod<int>`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 代码`GetMember("MyMethod<int>")`搜索文本同名的成员"`MyMethod<int>`"，而不是一个名为方法`MyMethod`具有的类型的一个泛型参数`int`。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays all the public static members of the `myString` class that start with the letter C.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的所有公共静态成员`myString`以字母 C 开头的类

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the members to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的成员的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The value to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的值。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 零，返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified members of the specified member type, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定绑定约束搜索指定成员类型的指定成员。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing the public members with the specified name, if found; otherwise, an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示具有指定名称的公共成员的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 对象数组（如果找到的话）；否则为空数组。

trans-unit.source: Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 成员包括属性、 方法、 字段、 事件和等等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetMember%2A> method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetMember%2A>方法不返回成员按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于成员的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的成员：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`在搜索中包括非公共成员 （即，私有、 内部和受保护成员）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not members that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的成员<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的成员。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To get the class initializer (.cctor) using this method overload, you must specify ".cctor" for `name`, <xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Constructor?displayProperty=nameWithType> for `type`, and <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> in Visual Basic) for `bindingAttr`.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取类初始值设定项 (.cctor) 使用此方法重载，必须指定".cctor"为`name`，<xref:System.Reflection.MemberTypes.Constructor?displayProperty=nameWithType>为`type`，和<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>中Visual Basic) 的`bindingAttr`。

trans-unit.source: You can also get the class initializer using the <xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以获取类初始值设定项使用<xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数搜索类约束的成员或成员的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型方法，不包括中的类型自变量`name`。

trans-unit.source: For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod<int>")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod<int>`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 代码`GetMember("MyMethod<int>")`搜索文本同名的成员"`MyMethod<int>`"，而不是一个名为方法`MyMethod`具有的类型的一个泛型参数`int`。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays all the methods of the `myString` class that start with the letter C.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的所有方法`myString`以字母 C 开头的类

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A derived class must provide an implementation.
trans-unit.target: 派生类必须提供一个实现。

trans-unit.source: Gets the members (properties, methods, fields, events, and so on) of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的成员（包括属性、方法、字段、事件等）。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public members of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回为当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的所有公共成员。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing all the public members of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 的所有公共成员的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />, if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> does not have public members.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 没有公共成员，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 成员包括属性、 方法、 字段、 事件和等等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A> method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>方法不返回成员按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于成员的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: This method overload calls the <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29> method overload, with <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载调用<xref:System.Type.GetMembers%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29>方法重载中，与<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: It will not find class initializers (.cctor).
trans-unit.target: 它将找不到类初始值设定项 (.cctor)。

trans-unit.source: To find class initializers, use an overload that takes <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>, and specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要查找类初始值设定项，请使用采用重载<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>，并指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: You can also get the class initializer using the <xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以获取类初始值设定项使用<xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数搜索类约束的成员或成员的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Type.GetMembers> method overload to collect information about all public members of a specified class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Type.GetMembers>方法重载来收集有关指定类的所有公共成员的信息。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero (<see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Default" />), to return an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果为零 (<see cref="F:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Default" />)，则返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the members defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定绑定约束，搜索为当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 定义的成员。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects representing all members defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that match the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 表示为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 定义的匹配指定绑定约束的所有成员的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" />, if no members are defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, or if none of the defined members match the binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 定义的成员，或者如果没有一个定义的成员匹配绑定约束，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: Members include properties, methods, fields, events, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 成员包括属性、 方法、 字段、 事件和等等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A> method does not return members in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>方法不返回成员按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which members are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于成员的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的成员：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`在搜索中包括非公共成员 （即，私有、 内部和受保护成员）。

trans-unit.source: Only protected and internal members on base classes are returned; private members on base classes are not returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅保护和; 不在返回基类上的内部成员基类上的私有成员不会返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not members that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的成员<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的成员。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method with only the `Public` flag or only the `NonPublic` flag will return the specified members and does not require any other flags.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法仅用`Public`标志或仅`NonPublic`标志将返回指定的成员，并且不需要任何其他标志。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To get the class initializer (.cctor) using this method overload, you must specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要获取类初始值设定项 (.cctor) 使用此方法重载，你必须指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: You can also get the class initializer using the <xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以获取类初始值设定项使用<xref:System.Type.TypeInitializer%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the current T:System.Type represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前表示构造的泛型类型，此方法将返回<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the members of the class constraint, or the members of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法的定义中的类型参数搜索类约束的成员或成员的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29> method overload to collect information about all public instance members of a specified class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Type.GetMembers%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29>方法重载来收集有关指定类的所有公共实例成员的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific method of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的特定方法。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the public method to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的公共方法的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the public method with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the public method with the specified name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有指定名称的公共方法的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search includes public static and public instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 搜索范围包括公共静态和公共实例方法。

trans-unit.source: If a method is overloaded and has more than one public method, the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%28System.String%29> method throws an <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果一种方法重载方法，有多个公共方法，<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%28System.String%29>方法抛出异常<xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>异常。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an exception is thrown because there is more than one public overload of the <xref:System.Int32.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，因为没有多个公共重载引发异常<xref:System.Int32.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, because the `Person.ToString` method overrides <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and therefore is not overloaded, the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%28System.String%29> method is able to retrieve the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，因为`Person.ToString`方法重写<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>并因此不重载，则<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%28System.String%29>方法是能够检索<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can do one of the following to retrieve a specific method:
trans-unit.target: 你可以执行以下操作以检索特定的方法之一：

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%29> method and specify a `bindingAttr` argument that uniquely identifies the method.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%29>方法并指定`bindingAttr`唯一标识该方法的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the exception is thrown because a type has a static and an instance overload, you can specify a `bindingAttr` argument of <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType>`Or`<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果将引发异常，因为类型具有一个静态和实例重载，则可以指定`bindingAttr`参数<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> `Or` <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Call an overload of the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A> method that includes a `types` parameter which defines the types of the method's parameters.
trans-unit.target: 调用的重载<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A>包含方法中，`types`参数定义的方法的参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Type.GetMethods> method to retrieve an array containing all of the public methods belonging to a type.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Type.GetMethods>方法来检索包含所有属于一种类型的公共方法的数组。

trans-unit.source: You can then iterate it to identify the duplicate methods named `name`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以循环来标识重复的方法名为`name`。

trans-unit.source: If the current T:System.Type represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前表示构造的泛型类型，此方法将返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法定义中搜索类约束的方法或方法的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型方法，不包括中的类型自变量`name`。

trans-unit.source: For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod<int>")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod<int>`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 代码`GetMember("MyMethod<int>")`搜索文本同名的成员"`MyMethod<int>`"，而不是一个名为方法`MyMethod`具有的类型的一个泛型参数`int`。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets a method named `MethodA`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取名为的方法`MethodA`。

trans-unit.source: More than one method is found with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 找到了多个具有指定名称的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的方法名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified method, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定绑定约束搜索指定方法。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the method that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的方法的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的方法：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> to include public methods in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>要包含在搜索中的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> to include non-public methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>要包含在搜索中的非公共方法 （即，私有、 内部和受保护的方法）。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy?displayProperty=nameWithType> to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy?displayProperty=nameWithType>包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.IgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.IgnoreCase?displayProperty=nameWithType> 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> to search only the methods declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not methods that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> 要搜索只有上声明的方法<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的方法。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If a method is overloaded and more than one overload meets the constraints specified by the `bindingAttr` argument, the method throws an <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果一种方法重载方法，多个重载满足指定的约束`bindingAttr`自变量，该方法将引发<xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>异常。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an exception is thrown because:
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，将引发异常，因为：

trans-unit.source: The `TestClass` type has two public instance overloads of the `DisplayValue` method, `DisplayValue(String)` and `DisplayValue(String, Object[])`.
trans-unit.target: `TestClass`类型具有两个公共实例重载`DisplayValue`方法，`DisplayValue(String)`和`DisplayValue(String, Object[])`。

trans-unit.source: The `TestClass` type has two public instance overloads of the `Equals` method, one of which is inherited from <xref:System.Object>: `Equals(TestClass)` and `Equals(Object)`.
trans-unit.target: `TestClass`类型具有两个公共实例重载`Equals`方法，其中一个继承自<xref:System.Object>:`Equals(TestClass)`和`Equals(Object)`。

trans-unit.source: You can do one of the following to retrieve a specific method:
trans-unit.target: 你可以执行以下操作以检索特定的方法之一：

trans-unit.source: Change the binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 更改的绑定约束。

trans-unit.source: In the previous example, attempting to retrieve a public instance `Equals` method that is declared by the type and not inherited successfully retrieves `Equals(TestClass)`.
trans-unit.target: 在前面的示例中，尝试检索公共实例`Equals`方法声明由类型并不继承成功检索`Equals(TestClass)`。

trans-unit.source: Call an overload of the <xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A> method that includes a `types` parameter which defines the types of the method's parameters.
trans-unit.target: 调用的重载<xref:System.Type.GetMethod%2A>包含方法中，`types`参数定义的方法的参数的类型。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Type.GetMethods%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29> method to retrieve an array containing all of the methods belonging to a type that have the specified binding attributes.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Type.GetMethods%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29>方法来检索包含所有具有指定的绑定特性的方法属于一种类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: You can then iterate it to identify the duplicate methods named `name`.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以循环来标识重复的方法名为`name`。

trans-unit.source: This approach is illustrated in the previous example's handler for the <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法如下所示的上一示例的处理程序<xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>异常。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法定义中搜索类约束的方法或方法的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型方法，不包括中的类型自变量`name`。

trans-unit.source: For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod<int>")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod<int>`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 代码`GetMember("MyMethod<int>")`搜索文本同名的成员"`MyMethod<int>`"，而不是一个名为方法`MyMethod`具有的类型的一个泛型参数`int`。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the method that matches the specified binding flags.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取符合指定的绑定标志的方法。

trans-unit.source: More than one method is found with the specified name and matching the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 找到多个具有指定名称且与指定绑定约束匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the public method to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的公共方法的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the number, order, and type of the parameters for the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 表示此方法要获取的参数的个数、顺序和类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects (as provided by the <see cref="F:System.Type.EmptyTypes" /> field) to get a method that takes no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 空的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组（由 <see cref="F:System.Type.EmptyTypes" /> 字段提供），用来获取不采用参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified public method whose parameters match the specified argument types.
trans-unit.target: 搜索其参数与指定参数类型匹配的指定公共方法。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the public method whose parameters match the specified argument types, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示其参数与指定参数类型匹配的公共方法的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search includes public static and public instance methods.
trans-unit.target: 搜索范围包括公共静态和公共实例方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods.
trans-unit.target: 查找构造函数和方法时，不能省略参数。

trans-unit.source: You can only omit parameters when invoking.
trans-unit.target: 在调用时，仅可以省略参数。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法定义中搜索类约束的方法或方法的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: The `name` parameter cannot include type arguments.
trans-unit.target: `name`参数不能包含类型参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, the C# code `GetMethod("MyGenericMethod<int>")` searches for a method with the text name "`MyGenericMethod<int>`", rather than for a method named `MyGenericMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 代码`GetMethod("MyGenericMethod<int>")`搜索具有文本名称的方法"`MyGenericMethod<int>`"，而不是一个名为方法`MyGenericMethod`具有的类型的一个泛型参数`int`。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use `GetMethod("MyGenericMethod")` with the appropriate parameter in the `types` array.
trans-unit.target: 请改用`GetMethod("MyGenericMethod")`中的相应参数`types`数组。

trans-unit.source: The following example finds specific overloads of `MethodA`, specifying a variety of argument types.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例查找的特定重载`MethodA`，指定不同的自变量类型。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] example requires the `/unsafe` compiler option.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)]示例需要`/unsafe`编译器选项。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> objects that represent the `Add` methods of a non-generic type (the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> class), an open generic type (the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> class), and a closed generic type (the `List(Of String)` type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象表示`Add`非泛型类型的方法 (<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>类)，开放式泛型类型 (<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>类)，和封闭式泛型类型 (`List(Of String)`类型。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a `GetAddMethod` method that retrieves the appropriate <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了`GetAddMethod`检索相应的方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: To provide the `types` argument for an open generic type, it calls the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供`types`开放式泛型类型参数，它调用<xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: To provide the `types` argument for a closed generic type, it retrieves the value of the <xref:System.Type.GenericTypeArguments%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供`types`封闭式泛型类型参数，它检索的值<xref:System.Type.GenericTypeArguments%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。
