trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> objects representing the attributes associated with the corresponding element in the <c>types</c> array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> 对象的数组，表示与 <c>types</c> 数组中的相应元素关联的特性。

trans-unit.source: To be only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled.
trans-unit.target: 仅当通过 COM 互操作进行调用时才使用，而且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。

trans-unit.source: The default binder does not process this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 默认的联编程序不处理此参数。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified method whose parameters match the specified argument types and modifiers, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定绑定约束，搜索其参数与指定自变量类型及修饰符匹配的指定方法。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the method that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的方法的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Although the default binder does not process <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier> (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract <xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType> class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`.
trans-unit.target: 虽然默认的联编程序不处理<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier>(`modifiers`参数)，你可以使用抽象<xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType>类编写的自定义的联编程序`modifiers`。

trans-unit.source: `ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled.
trans-unit.target: `ParameterModifier` 当通过 COM 互操作调用，才使用并且可以通过引用传递的参数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的方法：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public methods in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include nonpublic methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要包含在搜索中的非公共方法 （即，私有、 内部和受保护的方法）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the methods declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not methods that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索只有上声明的方法<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的方法。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods.
trans-unit.target: 查找构造函数和方法时，不能省略参数。

trans-unit.source: You can only omit parameters when invoking.
trans-unit.target: 在调用时，仅可以省略参数。

trans-unit.source: If the current T:System.Type represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前表示构造的泛型类型，此方法将返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法定义中搜索类约束的方法或方法的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: For generic methods, do not include the type arguments in `name`.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型方法，不包括中的类型自变量`name`。

trans-unit.source: For example, the C# code `GetMember("MyMethod<int>")` searches for a member with the text name "`MyMethod<int>`", rather than for a method named `MyMethod` that has one generic argument of type `int`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C# 代码`GetMember("MyMethod<int>")`搜索文本同名的成员"`MyMethod<int>`"，而不是一个名为方法`MyMethod`具有的类型的一个泛型参数`int`。

trans-unit.source: The following example finds specific overloads of `MethodA`, specifying binding constraints and a variety of argument types.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例查找的特定重载`MethodA`，指定绑定约束和不同的自变量类型。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)] example requires the `/unsafe` compiler option.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)]示例需要`/unsafe`编译器选项。

trans-unit.source: More than one method is found with the specified name and matching the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 找到多个具有指定名称且与指定绑定约束匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="types" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="types" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the elements in <paramref name="types" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="types" /> 的其中一个元素为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="types" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="types" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="modifiers" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="modifiers" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的方法名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，该对象定义一组属性并启用绑定，而绑定可能涉及选择重载方法、强制参数类型和通过反射调用成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), to use the <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 <see langword="Nothing" /> 的空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />）。

trans-unit.source: The object that specifies the set of rules to use regarding the order and layout of arguments, how the return value is passed, what registers are used for arguments, and how the stack is cleaned up.
trans-unit.target: 该对象用于指定要使用的一套规则，这些规则涉及自变量的顺序和布局、传递返回值的方式、用于自变量的寄存器和清理堆栈的方式。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the number, order, and type of the parameters for the method to get.
trans-unit.target: 表示此方法要获取的参数的个数、顺序和类型的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects (as provided by the <see cref="F:System.Type.EmptyTypes" /> field) to get a method that takes no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 空的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组（由 <see cref="F:System.Type.EmptyTypes" /> 字段提供），用来获取不采用参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> objects representing the attributes associated with the corresponding element in the <c>types</c> array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> 对象的数组，表示与 <c>types</c> 数组中的相应元素关联的特性。

trans-unit.source: To be only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled.
trans-unit.target: 仅当通过 COM 互操作进行调用时才使用，而且仅处理通过引用传递的参数。

trans-unit.source: The default binder does not process this parameter.
trans-unit.target: 默认的联编程序不处理此参数。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified method whose parameters match the specified argument types and modifiers, using the specified binding constraints and the specified calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的绑定约束和指定的调用约定，搜索参数与指定的自变量类型及修饰符相匹配的指定方法。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the method that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的方法的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Although the default binder does not process <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier> (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract <xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType> class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`.
trans-unit.target: 虽然默认的联编程序不处理<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier>(`modifiers`参数)，你可以使用抽象<xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType>类编写的自定义的联编程序`modifiers`。

trans-unit.source: `ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled.
trans-unit.target: `ParameterModifier` 当通过 COM 互操作调用，才使用并且可以通过引用传递的参数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `GetXXX` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`GetXXX`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的方法：

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the specified method whose parameters match the specified argument types and modifiers, using the specified binding constraints and the specified calling convention.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定的绑定约束和指定的调用约定搜索其参数与指定的自变量类型和修饰符匹配的指定方法。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the method that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的方法的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Although the default binder does not process <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier> (the `modifiers` parameter), you can use the abstract <xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType> class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers`.
trans-unit.target: 虽然默认的联编程序不处理<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier>(`modifiers`参数)，你可以使用抽象<xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType>类编写的自定义的联编程序`modifiers`。

trans-unit.source: `ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled.
trans-unit.target: `ParameterModifier` 当通过 COM 互操作调用，才使用并且可以通过引用传递的参数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: If `types` is `null`, arguments are not matched.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `types` 为 `null`，则参数不匹配。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的方法：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public methods in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要包含在搜索中的非公共方法 （即，私有、 内部和受保护的方法）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the methods declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not methods that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索只有上声明的方法<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的方法。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: More than one method is found with the specified name and matching the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 找到多个具有指定名称且与指定绑定约束匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="types" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="types" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="modifiers" /> is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="modifiers" /> 是多维的。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="types" /> and <paramref name="modifiers" /> do not have the same length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="types" /> 和 <paramref name="modifiers" /> 的长度不相同。

trans-unit.source: The current type is a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> or <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型是 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.GenericTypeParameterBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public methods of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回为当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的所有公共方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects representing all the public methods defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 定义的所有公共方法的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />, if no public methods are defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 定义的公共方法，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetMethods%2A> method does not return methods in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetMethods%2A>方法不返回方法按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which methods are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于方法的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: Constructors are not included in the array of methods returned by this call.
trans-unit.target: 此调用所返回的方法的数组中不包括构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Make a separate call to `GetConstructors()` to get the constructor methods.
trans-unit.target: 请单独调用`GetConstructors()`若要获取的构造函数方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods.
trans-unit.target: 查找构造函数和方法时，不能省略参数。

trans-unit.source: You can only omit parameters when invoking.
trans-unit.target: 在调用时，仅可以省略参数。

trans-unit.source: If the current T:System.Type represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前表示构造的泛型类型，此方法将返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法定义中搜索类约束的方法或方法的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the methods defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定绑定约束，搜索为当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 定义的方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> objects representing all methods defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that match the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 表示为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 定义的匹配指定绑定约束的所有方法的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" />, if no methods are defined for the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, or if none of the defined methods match the binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 定义的方法，或者如果没有一个定义的方法匹配绑定约束，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetMethods%2A> method does not return methods in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetMethods%2A>方法不返回方法按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which methods are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于方法的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which methods to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的方法：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public methods in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public methods (that is, private, internal, and protected methods) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`要包含在搜索中的非公共方法 （即，私有、 内部和受保护的方法）。

trans-unit.source: Only protected and internal methods on base classes are returned; private methods on base classes are not returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅保护和; 基类上的内部方法不返回不会返回私有基类上的方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the methods declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not methods that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索只有上声明的方法<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的方法。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You cannot omit parameters when looking up constructors and methods.
trans-unit.target: 查找构造函数和方法时，不能省略参数。

trans-unit.source: You can only omit parameters when invoking.
trans-unit.target: 在调用时，仅可以省略参数。

trans-unit.source: If the current T:System.Type represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前表示构造的泛型类型，此方法将返回<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the methods of the class constraint, or the methods of <xref:System.Object> if there is no class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型或泛型方法，则此方法定义中搜索类约束的方法或方法的<xref:System.Object>如果没有类约束。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a class with two public methods and one protected method, creates a `Type` object corresponding to `MyTypeClass`, gets all public and non-public methods, and displays their names.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建具有两个公共方法和一个受保护的方法的类，创建`Type`对象对应于`MyTypeClass`，获取所有的公共和非公共方法，并显示其名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific type nested within the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取嵌套在当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的特定类型。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the nested type to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的嵌套类型的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the public nested type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的公共嵌套类型。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the public nested type with the specified name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如找到，则为表示具有指定名称的公共嵌套类型的对象；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Use the simple name of the nested class for `name`.
trans-unit.target: 使用嵌套类的简单名称`name`。

trans-unit.source: Do not qualify it with the name of the outer class.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用外部类名称限定它。

trans-unit.source: For a generic nested class, use the mangled name — that is, append a grave accent and the number of generic arguments.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型的嵌套类，使用重整的名称-即，追加了抑音符和泛型参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the string "Inner\`1" to get the generic nested class `Inner<T>` (`Inner(Of T)` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用字符串"内部\`1"来获取泛型嵌套类`Inner<T>`(`Inner(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Do not include language-specific syntax for type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 不包括类型参数的特定于语言的语法。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the nested types of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: If a nested type is generic, this method returns its generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌套的类型是泛型，则此方法将返回其泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if the enclosing generic type is a closed constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 即使封闭泛型类型是封闭式构造的类型，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a generic type defined in C#, Visual Basic, or C++, its nested types are all generic even if they have no generic parameters of their own.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示 C#、 Visual Basic 或 c + + 中, 定义的泛型类型及其嵌套的类型是所有泛型的即使它们具有没有其自己的泛型形参。

trans-unit.source: This is not necessarily true of nested types defined in dynamic assemblies or compiled with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 这不一定是真正的动态程序集中定义的或使用编译的嵌套类型[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information on nested generic types, and on constructing nested generic types from their generic type definitions, see <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的泛型类型和构造嵌套的泛型类型，将从其泛型类型定义的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the nested type to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的嵌套类型的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the specified nested type, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定绑定约束搜索指定嵌套类型。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the nested type that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的嵌套类型的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the simple name of the nested class for `name`.
trans-unit.target: 使用嵌套类的简单名称`name`。

trans-unit.source: Do not qualify it with the name of the outer class.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用外部类名称限定它。

trans-unit.source: For a generic nested class, use the mangled name — that is, append a grave accent and the number of generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型的嵌套类，使用重整的名称-即，追加了抑音符和泛型参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: For example, use the string "Inner\`1" to get the generic nested class `Inner<T>` (`Inner(Of T)` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用字符串"内部\`1"来获取泛型嵌套类`Inner<T>`(`Inner(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Do not include language-specific syntax for type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 不包括类型参数的特定于语言的语法。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which nested types to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>要包括在搜索中的标志可以用于定义其嵌套的筛选器类型：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>要获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> to include public nested types in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>要包含在搜索中的公共嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> to include non-public nested types (that is, private, internal, and protected nested types) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>要包含在搜索中的非公共嵌套的类型 （即，私有、 内部和受保护嵌套类型）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns only the nested types of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回仅当前类型的嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: It does not search the base classes of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 它不会搜索当前类型的基类。

trans-unit.source: To find types that are nested in base classes, you must walk the inheritance hierarchy, calling <xref:System.Type.GetNestedType%2A> at each level.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找在基类中嵌套的类型，必须遍历继承层次结构，调用<xref:System.Type.GetNestedType%2A>在每个级别。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> are ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType>将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method with only the <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag or only the <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag will return the specified nested types and does not require any other flags.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法仅用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志或仅<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志将返回指定的嵌套类型，并不需要任何其他标志。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the nested types of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: If a nested type is generic, this method returns its generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌套的类型是泛型，则此方法将返回其泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if the enclosing generic type is a closed constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 即使封闭泛型类型是封闭式构造的类型，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a generic type defined in C#, Visual Basic, or C++, its nested types are all generic even if they have no generic parameters of their own.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示 C#、 Visual Basic 或 c + + 中, 定义的泛型类型及其嵌套的类型是所有泛型的即使它们具有没有其自己的泛型形参。

trans-unit.source: This is not necessarily true of nested types defined in dynamic assemblies or compiled with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 这不一定是真正的动态程序集中定义的或使用编译的嵌套类型[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information on nested generic types, and on constructing nested generic types from their generic type definitions, see <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的泛型类型和构造嵌套的泛型类型，将从其泛型类型定义的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the types nested within the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取嵌套在当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the public types nested in the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回嵌套在当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的公共类型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing the public types nested in the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (the search is not recursive), or an empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Type" /> if no public types are nested in the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象的数组，这些对象表示嵌套在当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的公共类型（搜索是非递归的）；如果当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中没有嵌套公共类型，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetNestedTypes%2A> method does not return types in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetNestedTypes%2A>方法不返回类型按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which types are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于类型的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: Only the public types immediately nested in the current type are returned; the search is not recursive.
trans-unit.target: 返回仅立即嵌套在当前类型的公共类型;搜索是非递归。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the nested types of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: If a nested type is generic, this method returns its generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果嵌套的类型是泛型，则此方法将返回其泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: This is true even if the enclosing generic type is a closed constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 即使封闭泛型类型是封闭式构造的类型，也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a generic type defined in C#, Visual Basic, or C++, its nested types are all generic even if they have no generic parameters of their own.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示 C#、 Visual Basic 或 c + + 中, 定义的泛型类型及其嵌套的类型是所有泛型的即使它们具有没有其自己的泛型形参。

trans-unit.source: This is not necessarily true of nested types defined in dynamic assemblies or compiled with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md).
trans-unit.target: 这不一定是真正的动态程序集中定义的或使用编译的嵌套类型[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information on nested generic types, and on constructing nested generic types from their generic type definitions, see <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的泛型类型和构造嵌套的泛型类型，将从其泛型类型定义的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a nested class and a `struct` in `MyClass`, and then obtains objects of the nested types using the type of `MyClass`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义了一个嵌套的类和一个`struct`中`MyClass`，然后，获取使用的类型的嵌套类型的对象和`MyClass`。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the types nested in the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定绑定约束搜索嵌套在当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的类型。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects representing all the types nested in the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that match the specified binding constraints (the search is not recursive), or an empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Type" />, if no nested types are found that match the binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组，这些对象表示嵌套在当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 中的所有与指定的绑定约束匹配的类型（搜索是非递归的）；如果没有找到与绑定约束匹配的嵌套类型，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: The search for nested types is not recursive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索嵌套类型不是递归的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetNestedTypes%2A> method does not return types in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetNestedTypes%2A>方法不返回类型按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which types are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于类型的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which nested types to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>要包括在搜索中的标志可以用于定义其嵌套的筛选器类型：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>要获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> to include public nested types in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType>要包含在搜索中的公共嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> to include non-public nested types (that is, private, internal, and protected nested types) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType>要包含在搜索中的非公共嵌套的类型 （即，私有、 内部和受保护嵌套类型）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns only the nested types of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回仅当前类型的嵌套的类型。

trans-unit.source: It does not search the base classes of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 它不会搜索当前类型的基类。

trans-unit.source: To find types that are nested in base classes, you must walk the inheritance hierarchy, calling <xref:System.Type.GetNestedTypes%2A> at each level.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> are ignored.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method with only the <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Public?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag or only the <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag will return the specified nested types and does not require any other flags.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.

trans-unit.source: This is true even if the enclosing generic type is a closed constructed type.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two nested public classes and two nested protected classes, and displays information for classes that match the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建两个嵌套公共类和两个嵌套的受保护的类，并显示的匹配指定的绑定约束的类的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the public properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回为当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的所有公共属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> objects representing all public properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 的所有公共属性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />, if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> does not have public properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 没有公共属性，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: Calling this overload is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Type.GetProperties%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29> overload with a `bindingAttr` argument equal to `BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public` in C# and `BindingFlags.Instance Or BindingFlags.Static Or BindingFlags.Public` in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 调用此重载是等效于调用<xref:System.Type.GetProperties%28System.Reflection.BindingFlags%29>重载`bindingAttr`参数等于`BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public`在 C# 和`BindingFlags.Instance Or BindingFlags.Static Or BindingFlags.Public`在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: It returns all public instance and static properties, both those defined by the type represented by the current <xref:System.Type> object as well as those inherited from its base types.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回所有公共实例和静态属性，定义表示由当前的类型的两个那些<xref:System.Type>对象，以及从其基类型继承。

trans-unit.source: A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已是公共的至少一个访问器，属性被视为反射到公共。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该属性被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetProperties%2A> method does not return properties in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetProperties%2A>方法不返回属性按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which properties are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于属性的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: If the current T:System.Type represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前表示构造的泛型类型，此方法将返回<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `GetProperties` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `GetProperties` 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, searches for the properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定绑定约束，搜索当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的属性。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> objects representing all properties of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that match the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 的匹配指定绑定约束的所有属性的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty array of type <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" />, if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> does not have properties, or if none of the properties match the binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo" /> 没有属性，或者如果没有一个属性匹配绑定约束，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 类型的空数组。

trans-unit.source: A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已是公共的至少一个访问器，属性被视为反射到公共。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该属性被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetProperties%2A> method does not return properties in a particular order, such as alphabetical or declaration order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetProperties%2A>方法不返回属性按特定的顺序，如按字母顺序排列或声明顺序排列。

trans-unit.source: Your code must not depend on the order in which properties are returned, because that order varies.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码必须不依赖于属性的返回顺序因为该顺序可以改变。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which nested types to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>要包括在搜索中的标志可以用于定义其嵌套的筛选器类型：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public properties in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public properties (that is, private, internal, and protected properties) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`若要在搜索中包含非公共属性 （即，私有、 内部和受保护属性）。

trans-unit.source: Only protected and internal properties on base classes are returned; private properties on base classes are not returned.
trans-unit.target: 仅保护和; 基类上的内部属性不返回不会返回私有基类上的属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the properties declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not properties that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 若要搜索仅上声明的属性<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的属性。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已是公共的至少一个访问器，属性被视为反射到公共。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该属性被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: If the current T:System.Type represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> objects with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前表示构造的泛型类型，此方法将返回<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>与替换为相应的类型实参的类型参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines a class named `PropertyClass` that includes six properties: two are public, one is private, one is protected, one is internal (`Friend` in Visual Basic), and one is protected internal (`Protected Friend` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义一个名为`PropertyClass`包括六个属性： 两个都是公开，一个是私有、 受保护的一个，是内部 (`Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)，并且其中一个受保护内部 (`Protected Friend`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: It then displays some basic property information (the property name and type, whether it is read/write, and the visibility of its `get` and `set` accessors) for the properties that match the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示一些基本属性信息 (属性名称和类型、 是否是读/写，并且的可见性其`get`和`set`访问器) 的匹配指定的绑定约束的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific property of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的特定属性。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the public property to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的公共属性名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the public property with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称的公共属性。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the public property with the specified name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有指定名称的公共属性的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search includes public static and public instance properties.
trans-unit.target: 搜索包含公共静态和公共实例的属性。

trans-unit.source: A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已是公共的至少一个访问器，属性被视为反射到公共。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该属性被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的属性。

trans-unit.source: Situations in which <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> occurs include the following:
trans-unit.target: 在其中的情况下<xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>发生如下：

trans-unit.source: A type contains two indexed properties that have the same name but different numbers of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 某个类型包含两个具有相同的索引的属性名称但不同数量的参数。

trans-unit.source: To resolve the ambiguity, use an overload of the <xref:System.Type.GetProperty%2A> method that specifies parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 若要解析多义性，使用的重载<xref:System.Type.GetProperty%2A>方法，它指定参数类型。

trans-unit.source: A derived type declares a property that hides an inherited property with the same name, by using the `new` modifier (`Shadows` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 派生的类型声明一个属性，通过使用隐藏继承的属性具有相同的名称，`new`修饰符 (`Shadows`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: To resolve the ambiguity, use the <xref:System.Type.GetProperty%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%29> method overload and add the <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to restrict the search to members that are not inherited.
trans-unit.target: 若要解析多义性，使用<xref:System.Type.GetProperty%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.BindingFlags%29>方法重载，并添加<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志以将搜索限制为不会继承的成员。

trans-unit.source: Indexers and Default Properties
trans-unit.target: 索引器和默认属性

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] have simplified syntax for accessing indexed properties and allow one indexed property to be a default for its type.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)][!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)]简化访问索引的属性的语法，并允许一个索引的属性，为其类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the variable `myList` refers to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, the syntax `myList[3]` (`myList(3)` in Visual Basic) retrieves the element with the index of 3.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果变量`myList`指<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，语法`myList[3]`(`myList(3)`在 Visual Basic 中) 检索索引为 3 的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can overload the property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重载属性。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this feature is called an indexer and cannot be refered to by name.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，此功能称为一个索引器，且不能按名称引用。

trans-unit.source: By default, a C# indexer appears in metadata as an indexed property named "Item".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，C# 索引器元数据中显示作为名为"Item"索引属性。

trans-unit.source: However, a class library developer can use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IndexerNameAttribute> attribute to change the name of the indexer in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 但是，类库开发人员可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IndexerNameAttribute>特性更改的元数据中索引器的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.String> class has an indexer named <xref:System.String.Chars%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.String>类具有名为一个索引器<xref:System.String.Chars%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Indexed properties created using languages other than C# can have names other than Item, as well.
trans-unit.target: 以外项，名称也可以使用 C# 以外的语言创建的索引的属性。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a type has a default property, use the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%28System.Type%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method to test for the <xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定类型是否具有默认属性，请使用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%28System.Type%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法来测试<xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the type has <xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute>, the <xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute.MemberName%2A> property returns the name of the default property.
trans-unit.target: 如果该类型具有<xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute>、<xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性返回的默认属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the `Type` object of a user-defined class, retrieves a property of that class, and displays the property name.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索`Type`对象的用户定义的类，检索该类的属性，并显示属性名称。

trans-unit.source: Internally, this property is referred to in the metadata by the name "Item."
trans-unit.target: 在内部，此属性由所引用的元数据中的名称"项。"

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to get `PropertyInfo` using reflection must specify this internal name in order to correctly return the `PropertyInfo` property.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的任何尝试`PropertyInfo`使用反射必须指定此内部名称，以正确地返回`PropertyInfo`属性。

trans-unit.source: More than one property is found with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 找到了多个具有指定名称的属性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the property to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的属性名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Zero, to return <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 零，以返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified property, using the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的绑定约束搜索指定属性。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the property that matches the specified requirements, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示符合指定要求的属性的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已是公共的至少一个访问器，属性被视为反射到公共。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该属性被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which properties to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括哪些属性：

trans-unit.source: You must specify either `BindingFlags.Instance` or `BindingFlags.Static` in order to get a return.
trans-unit.target: 你必须指定`BindingFlags.Instance`或`BindingFlags.Static`为了获取返回。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public properties in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public properties (that is, private, internal, and protected properties) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`若要在搜索中包含非公共属性 （即，私有、 内部和受保护属性）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include `public` and `protected` static members up the hierarchy; `private` static members in inherited classes are not included.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括`public`和`protected`沿层次结构; 向上的静态成员`private`继承类中的静态成员不包括。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the properties declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not properties that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 若要搜索仅上声明的属性<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的属性。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的属性。

trans-unit.source: Situations in which <xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException> occurs include the following:
trans-unit.target: 在其中的情况下<xref:System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException>发生如下：

trans-unit.source: A type contains two indexed properties that have the same name but different numbers of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 某个类型包含两个具有相同的索引的属性名称但不同数量的参数。

trans-unit.source: To resolve the ambiguity, use an overload of the <xref:System.Type.GetProperty%2A> method that specifies parameter types.
trans-unit.target: 若要解析多义性，使用的重载<xref:System.Type.GetProperty%2A>方法，它指定参数类型。

trans-unit.source: A derived type declares a property that hides an inherited property with the same name, using the `new` modifier (`Shadows` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 派生的类型声明一个属性，隐藏继承的属性具有相同的名称，使用`new`修饰符 (`Shadows`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: To resolve the ambiguity, include <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType> to restrict the search to members that are not inherited.
trans-unit.target: 若要解析多义性，包括<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly?displayProperty=nameWithType>以限制对不会继承的成员的搜索。

trans-unit.source: Indexers and Default Properties
trans-unit.target: 索引器和默认属性

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)] have simplified syntax for accessing indexed properties and allow one indexed property to be a default for its type.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)][!INCLUDE[csprcslong](~/includes/csprcslong-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[vcprvclong](~/includes/vcprvclong-md.md)]简化访问索引的属性的语法，并允许一个索引的属性，为其类型的默认值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the variable `myList` refers to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, the syntax `myList[3]` (`myList(3)` in Visual Basic) retrieves the element with the index of 3.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果变量`myList`指<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，语法`myList[3]`(`myList(3)`在 Visual Basic 中) 检索索引为 3 的元素。

trans-unit.source: You can overload the property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以重载属性。

trans-unit.source: In C#, this feature is called an indexer and cannot be refered to by name.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，此功能称为一个索引器，且不能按名称引用。

trans-unit.source: By default, a C# indexer appears in metadata as an indexed property named "Item".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，C# 索引器元数据中显示作为名为"Item"索引属性。

trans-unit.source: However, a class library developer can use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IndexerNameAttribute> attribute to change the name of the indexer in the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 但是，类库开发人员可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.IndexerNameAttribute>特性更改的元数据中索引器的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.String> class has an indexer named <xref:System.String.Chars%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.String>类具有名为一个索引器<xref:System.String.Chars%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Indexed properties created using languages other than C# can have names other than Item, as well.
trans-unit.target: 以外项，名称也可以使用 C# 以外的语言创建的索引的属性。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a type has a default property, use the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%28System.Type%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method to test for the <xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定类型是否具有默认属性，请使用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%28System.Type%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法来测试<xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the type has <xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute>, the <xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute.MemberName%2A> property returns the name of the default property.
trans-unit.target: 如果该类型具有<xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute>、<xref:System.Reflection.DefaultMemberAttribute.MemberName%2A>属性返回的默认属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example retrieves the type of a user-defined class, retrieves a property of that class and displays the property name in accordance with the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例检索用户定义的类的类型，检索该类的属性并显示根据指定的绑定约束的属性名称。

trans-unit.source: More than one property is found with the specified name and matching the specified binding constraints.
trans-unit.target: 找到多个具有指定名称的属性且属性与指定绑定约束匹配。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the public property to get.
trans-unit.target: 包含要获取的公共属性名的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The return type of the property.
trans-unit.target: 属性的返回类型。

trans-unit.source: Searches for the public property with the specified name and return type.
trans-unit.target: 搜索具有指定名称和返回类型的公共属性。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the public property with the specified name, if found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有指定名称的公共属性的对象（如果找到的话）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A property is considered public to reflection if it has at least one accessor that is public.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已是公共的至少一个访问器，属性被视为反射到公共。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the property is considered private, and you must use <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (in Visual Basic, combine the values using `Or`) to get it.
trans-unit.target: 否则，该属性被视为私有的并且你必须使用<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance?displayProperty=nameWithType> | <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Static?displayProperty=nameWithType> (在 Visual Basic 中，组合使用这些值`Or`) 来获取它。

trans-unit.source: The search for `name` is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 搜索`name`区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search includes public static and public instance properties.
trans-unit.target: 搜索包含公共静态和公共实例的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this method returns the <xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo> with the type parameters replaced by the appropriate type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此方法返回<xref:System.Reflection.PropertyInfo>具有类型参数替换为相应的类型实参。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this method searches the properties of the class constraint.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数在泛型类型或泛型方法定义中，此方法搜索类约束的属性。
