trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示泛型类型，并且其类型参数之一不满足相应类型参数的约束。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and the assembly or one of its dependencies was not found.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且未找到程序集或程序集的某个依赖项。

trans-unit.source: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" />, instead.
trans-unit.target: 在[适用于 Windows 应用商店应用的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或[可移植类库](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改为捕获基类异常 <see cref="T:System.IO.IOException" />。

trans-unit.source: The assembly or one of its dependencies was found, but could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 找到了程序集或其依赖项之一，但无法加载它们。

trans-unit.source: The assembly or one of its dependencies is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 程序集或其依赖项之一无效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded, and the assembly was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 当前加载的是公共语言运行时 2.0 版或更高版本，而程序集使用更高的版本编译。

trans-unit.source: The assembly-qualified name of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" />.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: If the type is in the currently executing assembly or in Mscorlib.dll, it is sufficient to supply the type name qualified by its namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果该类型位于当前正在执行的程序集中或者 Mscorlib.dll 中，则提供由命名空间限定的类型名称就足够了。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to throw an exception if the type cannot be found; <see langword="false" /> to return <see langword="null" />.Specifying <see langword="false" /> also suppresses some other exception conditions, but not all of them.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 则引发异常（如果找不到类型）；<see langword="false" /> 则返回<see langword="null" />.Specifying<see langword="false" />，也抑制了其他一些异常情况，但不是所有异常。

trans-unit.source: See the Exceptions section.
trans-unit.target: 请参见“异常”部分。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to perform a case-insensitive search for <c>typeName</c>, <see langword="false" /> to perform a case-sensitive search for <c>typeName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则执行不区分大小写的 <c>typeName</c> 搜索；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则执行区分大小写的 <c>typeName</c> 搜索。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> with the specified name, specifying whether to throw an exception if the type is not found and whether to perform a case-sensitive search.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定名称的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，指定是否执行区分大小写的搜索，以及在找不到类型时是否引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The type with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名称的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the type is not found, the <paramref name="throwOnError" /> parameter specifies whether <see langword="null" /> is returned or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到该类型，则 <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 参数指定是返回 <see langword="null" /> 还是引发异常。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, an exception is thrown regardless of the value of <paramref name="throwOnError" />.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，将引发异常，而不考虑 <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: See the Exceptions section.
trans-unit.target: 请参见“异常”部分。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Type> object for a type in another assembly, if the you know its namespace-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法来获取<xref:System.Type>中另一个程序集中，类型的对象，如果你知道其命名空间限定名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> causes loading of the assembly specified in `typeName`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> 导致中指定的程序集的加载`typeName`。

trans-unit.source: You can also load an assembly using the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A> method, and then use the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> or <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetTypes%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> class to get <xref:System.Type> objects.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以加载程序集使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A>方法，，然后使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>或<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetTypes%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>类，以获取<xref:System.Type>对象。

trans-unit.source: If a type is in an assembly known to your program at compile time, it is more efficient to use `typeof` in C#, <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> in Visual Basic, or `typeid` in C++.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个类型位于到你的程序在编译时已知的程序集中，它会更加高效使用`typeof`在 C# 中，<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>在 Visual Basic 中，或`typeid`c + + 中。

trans-unit.source: `GetType` only works on assemblies loaded from disk.
trans-unit.target: `GetType` 仅适用于从磁盘加载的程序集。

trans-unit.source: If you call `GetType` to look up a type defined in a dynamic assembly defined using the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit> services, you might get inconsistent behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用`GetType`查找中使用定义的动态程序集定义的类型<xref:System.Reflection.Emit>服务，你可能会不一致的行为。

trans-unit.source: The behavior depends on whether the dynamic assembly is persistent, that is, created using the `RunAndSave` or `Save` access modes of the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 行为取决于动态程序集是持久的即，创建使用`RunAndSave`或`Save`访问模式的<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic assembly is persistent and has been written to disk before `GetType` is called, the loader finds the saved assembly on disk, loads that assembly, and retrieves the type from that assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态程序集是持久性的并且已写入到磁盘之前`GetType`是调用，加载程序磁盘上找到保存的程序集，加载该程序集，并检索该程序集的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the assembly has not been saved to disk when `GetType` is called, the method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果程序集未保存到磁盘时`GetType`调用时，该方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: `GetType` does not understand transient dynamic assemblies; therefore, calling `GetType` to retrieve a type in a transient dynamic assembly returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: `GetType` 不能理解瞬态动态程序集;因此，调用`GetType`检索瞬态中的类型动态程序集返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: To use `GetType` on a dynamic module, subscribe to the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType> event and call `GetType` before saving.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用`GetType`上动态模块，订阅<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件并调用`GetType`在保存前。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you will get two copies of the assembly in memory.
trans-unit.target: 否则，你将在内存中得到的程序集的两个副本。

trans-unit.source: The `throwOnError` parameter specifies what happens when the type is not found, and also suppresses certain other exception conditions, as described in the Exceptions section.
trans-unit.target: `throwOnError`参数指定时会发生什么情况类型未找到，并还会取消取消某些其他异常条件，如异常部分中所述。

trans-unit.source: Some exceptions are thrown regardless of the value of `throwOnError`.
trans-unit.target: 一些例外情况引发而不考虑的值`throwOnError`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the type is found but cannot be loaded, a <xref:System.TypeLoadException> is thrown even if `throwOnError` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果找到的类型，但不能加载，<xref:System.TypeLoadException>引发即使`throwOnError`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows what members of a base class are returned by the `Get` methods when reflecting on a type.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示返回通过基类的成员`Get`反射的类型上时的方法。

trans-unit.source: Member Type
trans-unit.target: 成员类型

trans-unit.source: Static
trans-unit.target: Static

trans-unit.source: Non-Static
trans-unit.target: 非静态

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Field
trans-unit.target: 字段

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A field is always hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 字段始终为按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Event
trans-unit.target: 事件

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: 方法

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes.
trans-unit.target: 可以。

trans-unit.source: A method (both virtual and non-virtual) can be hide-by-name or hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 方法 （虚拟和非虚拟） 可以隐藏按名称或按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Nested Type
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Not applicable
trans-unit.target: 不适用

trans-unit.source: The common type system rule is that the inheritance is the same as that of the methods that implement the property.
trans-unit.target: 常规类型系统规则是： 继承实现的属性的方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Reflection treats properties as hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 反射视为由名称和签名隐藏的属性。

trans-unit.source: See note 2 below.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注 2 下面。

trans-unit.source: Hide-by-name-and-signature considers all of the parts of the signature, including custom modifiers, return types, parameter types, sentinels, and unmanaged calling conventions.
trans-unit.target: 按名称和签名隐藏会将所有的部分的签名，包括自定义修饰符，返回类型、 参数类型、 标记和非托管调用约定。

trans-unit.source: This is a binary comparison.
trans-unit.target: 这是二进制比较。

trans-unit.source: For reflection, properties and events are hide-by-name-and-signature.
trans-unit.target: 为反射，属性和事件都是按名称和签名隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If you have a property with both a get and a set accessor in the base class, but the derived class has only a get accessor, the derived class property hides the base class property, and you will not be able to access the setter on the base class.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有具有同时具有 get 和 set 访问器的属性在基的类中，但派生的类具有仅一个 get 访问器，派生的类属性会隐藏基类属性中，并且你将无法访问基本类 setter。

trans-unit.source: Custom attributes are not part of the common type system.
trans-unit.target: 自定义属性不是常规类型系统的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Arrays or COM types are not searched for unless they have already been loaded into the table of available classes.
trans-unit.target: 数组或 COM 类型是不执行搜索，除非它们已经被加载到表中的可用类。

trans-unit.source: `typeName` can be the type name qualified by its namespace or an assembly-qualified name that includes an assembly name specification.
trans-unit.target: `typeName` 可以将类型名称由限定其命名空间或包含规范的程序集名称的程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If `typeName` includes the namespace but not the assembly name, this method searches only the calling object's assembly and Mscorlib.dll, in that order.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeName`包括命名空间而不是程序集名称，此方法搜索仅调用对象的程序集和 Mscorlib.dll，按此顺序。

trans-unit.source: If typeName is fully qualified with the partial or complete assembly name, this method searches in the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果部分或完整的程序集名称使用完全限定类型名称，此方法搜索在指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: If the assembly has a strong name, a complete assembly name is required.
trans-unit.target: 如果集具有强名称，则完整的程序集名称是必需的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property returns a fully qualified type name including nested types, the assembly name, and type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>属性返回包括嵌套的类型、 程序集名称和类型自变量的完全限定的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: All compilers that support the common language runtime will emit the simple name of a nested class, and reflection constructs a mangled name when queried, in accordance with the following conventions.
trans-unit.target: 所有支持公共语言运行时编译器将发出的嵌套类的简单名称和反射构造查询时，根据以下约定的重整的名称。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, processor architecture is added to assembly identity, and can be specified as part of assembly name strings.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，处理器体系结构添加到程序集标识，并且可以指定为程序集名称字符串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, "ProcessorArchitecture=msil".
trans-unit.target: 例如，"ProcessorArchitecture = msil"。

trans-unit.source: However, it is not included in the string returned by the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property, for compatibility reasons.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不包括在返回的字符串<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>属性，出于兼容性原因。

trans-unit.source: You can also load types by creating an <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> object and passing it to an appropriate overload of the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以通过创建加载类型<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>对象并将其传递到的相应重载<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to load types from the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 然后，可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来加载的程序集中的类型。

trans-unit.source: See also <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 另请参见<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Delimiter
trans-unit.target: 分隔符

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: 含义

trans-unit.source: Backslash (\\)
trans-unit.target: 反斜杠 (\\)

trans-unit.source: Escape character.
trans-unit.target: 转义字符。

trans-unit.source: Backtick (`)
trans-unit.target: 反撇号 （'）

trans-unit.source: Precedes one or more digits representing the number of type parameters, located at the end of the name of a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 前面有一个或多个数字表示多个类型参数，位于末尾的泛型类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Brackets ([])
trans-unit.target: 方括号 ([])

trans-unit.source: Enclose a generic type argument list, for a constructed generic type; within a type argument list, enclose an assembly-qualified type.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型参数列表，用于构造的泛型类型; 括起来在类型参数列表中，则将程序集限定的类型。

trans-unit.source: Comma (,)
trans-unit.target: 逗号 （，）

trans-unit.source: Precedes the Assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 之前的程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: Period (.)
trans-unit.target: 句点 （.）

trans-unit.source: Denotes namespace identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 表示命名空间标识符。

trans-unit.source: Plus sign (+)
trans-unit.target: 加号 （+）

trans-unit.source: Precedes a nested class.
trans-unit.target: 前面有嵌套的类。

trans-unit.source: For example, the fully qualified name for a class might look like this:
trans-unit.target: 例如，一个类的完全限定的名称可能如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the namespace were TopNamespace.Sub+Namespace, then the string would have to precede the plus sign (+) with an escape character (\\) to prevent it from being interpreted as a nesting separator.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名空间为 TopNamespace.Sub+Namespace，则字符串将不得不前面加一个转义字符加号 （+） (\\) 以防止它被解释为嵌套的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Reflection emits this string as follows:
trans-unit.target: 反射发出此字符串，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A "++" becomes "\\+\\+", and a "\\" becomes "\\\\".
This qualified name can be persisted and later used to load the <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: 可以保持此限定的名，并在以后使用它来加载<xref:System.Type>。

trans-unit.source: To search for and load a <xref:System.Type>, use <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> either with the type name only or with the assembly qualified type name.
trans-unit.target: 若要搜索并加载<xref:System.Type>，使用<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>与类型名称只有或程序集限定的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> with the type name only will look for the <xref:System.Type> in the caller's assembly and then in the System assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> 类型名称仅将查找的<xref:System.Type>调用方的程序集中，然后在系统程序集。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> with the assembly qualified type name will look for the <xref:System.Type> in any assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> 使用程序集限定的类型名称将会查找<xref:System.Type>任何程序集中。

trans-unit.source: Type names may include trailing characters that denote additional information about the type, such as whether the type is a reference type, a pointer type or an array type.
trans-unit.target: 类型名称可能包含表示的类型，例如类型是引用类型、 指针类型或数组类型有关的其他信息的尾随字符。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the type name without these trailing characters, use `t.GetElementType().ToString()`, where `t` is the type.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索的类型名称不具有这些尾随字符，请使用`t.GetElementType().ToString()`，其中`t`是的类型。

trans-unit.source: Spaces are relevant in all type name components except the assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 空间是适用于程序集名称之外的所有类型名称组件。

trans-unit.source: In the assembly name, spaces before the ',' separator are relevant, but spaces after the ',' separator are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在程序集名称中前 '，' 分隔符的空格相关，但是 '，' 分隔符后的空格将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The name of a generic type ends with a backtick (\`) followed by digits representing the number of generic type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型的名称结尾反撇号 (\`) 跟数字表示泛型类型参数的数目。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this name mangling is to allow compilers to support generic types with the same name but with different numbers of type parameters, occurring in the same scope.
trans-unit.target: 此名称重整的用途是允许编译器来支持在同一范围中发生的泛型类型具有相同名称但具有不同数量的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, reflection returns the mangled names `Tuple`1` and `Tuple`2` from the generic methods `Tuple(Of T)` and `Tuple(Of T0, T1)` in Visual Basic, or `Tuple<T>` and Tuple`\<T0, T1>` in Visual C#.
trans-unit.target: 例如，反射返回的重整的名称`Tuple`1` and `元组`2`从泛型方法`Tuple(Of T)`和`Tuple(Of T0, T1)`在 Visual Basic 中，或`Tuple<T>`和元组`\<T0, T1>`Visual C# 中。

trans-unit.source: For generic types, the type argument list is enclosed in brackets, and the type arguments are separated by commas.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型类型，类型参数列表括在方括号内，并由逗号分隔的类型自变量。

trans-unit.source: For example, a generic <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> has two type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，泛型<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>具有两个类型参数。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> of `MyType` with keys of type <xref:System.String> might be represented as follows:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>的`MyType`具有键的类型<xref:System.String>可能表示为以下形式：

trans-unit.source: To specify an assembly-qualified type within a type argument list, enclose the assembly-qualified type within brackets.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定类型参数列表中的程序集限定类型，请将括在括号内的程序集限定类型。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the commas that separate the parts of the assembly-qualified name are interpreted as delimiting additional type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 否则，分隔各个部分的程序集限定名称的逗号被解释为分隔其他类型参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> of `MyType` from MyAssembly.dll, with keys of type <xref:System.String>, might be specified as follows:
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>的`MyType`MyAssembly.dll，具有键的类型从<xref:System.String>，可能会按以下方式指定：

trans-unit.source: An assembly-qualified type can be enclosed in brackets only when it appears within a type parameter list.
trans-unit.target: 程序集限定的类型仅出现在类型参数列表中，可以将它们括在括号中。

trans-unit.source: The rules for searching assemblies for qualified and unqualified types in type parameter lists are the same as the rules for qualified and unqualified nongeneric types.
trans-unit.target: 用于在类型参数列表中搜索程序集限定和非限定类型的规则是限定和未限定的非泛型类型的规则相同。

trans-unit.source: Nullable types are a special case of generic types.
trans-unit.target: 可以为 null 的类型是泛型类型的特殊情况。

trans-unit.source: For example, a nullable <xref:System.Int32> is represented by the string "System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]".
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以为 null<xref:System.Int32>由字符串"System.Nullable'1[System.Int32]"。

trans-unit.source: In C#, C++, and Visual Basic you can also get nullable types using type operators.
trans-unit.target: 在 C#、 c + + 和 Visual Basic，还可获取可以为 null 的类型使用类型运算符。

trans-unit.source: For example, the nullable <xref:System.Boolean> type is returned by `typeof(Nullable<bool>)` in C#, by `Nullable<Boolean>::typeid` in C++, and by `GetType(Nullable(Of Boolean))` in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以为 null<xref:System.Boolean>返回类型`typeof(Nullable<bool>)`在 C# 中，通过`Nullable<Boolean>::typeid`c + + 中和`GetType(Nullable(Of Boolean))`在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the syntax you use with `GetType` for various types.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示与使用的语法`GetType`为各种类型。

trans-unit.source: To Get
trans-unit.target: 若要获取

trans-unit.source: Use
trans-unit.target: 使用

trans-unit.source: A nullable <xref:System.Int32>
trans-unit.target: 可以为 null <xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: `Type.GetType("System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]")`
trans-unit.target: `Type.GetType("System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]")`

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to `MyType`
trans-unit.target: 指向非托管的指针 `MyType`

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to a pointer to `MyType`
trans-unit.target: 非托管的指针的指针到 `MyType`

trans-unit.source: A managed pointer or reference to `MyType`
trans-unit.target: 托管的指针或对引用 `MyType`

trans-unit.source: `Type.GetType("MyType&")`.
trans-unit.target: `Type.GetType("MyType&")`。

trans-unit.source: Note that unlike pointers, references are limited to one level.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，与指针不同，引用仅限于一个级别。

trans-unit.source: A parent class and a nested class
trans-unit.target: 父类和嵌套的类

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array with a lower bound of 0
trans-unit.target: 下限为 0 的一维数组

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array with an unknown lower bound
trans-unit.target: 具有未知的下限的一维数组

trans-unit.source: An n-dimensional array
trans-unit.target: N 维数组

trans-unit.source: A comma (,) inside the brackets a total of n-1 times.
trans-unit.target: 在括号中的 n-1 次数一共逗号 （，）。

trans-unit.source: For example, `System.Object[,,]` represents a three-dimensional `Object` array.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`System.Object[,,]`表示一个三维`Object`数组。

trans-unit.source: A two-dimensional array's array
trans-unit.target: 二维数组的数组

trans-unit.source: A rectangular two-dimensional array with unknown lower bounds
trans-unit.target: 矩形二维数组具有未知的下限

trans-unit.source: A generic type with one type argument
trans-unit.target: 具有一个类型参数的泛型类型

trans-unit.source: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[MyType]")`
trans-unit.target: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[MyType]")`

trans-unit.source: A generic type with two type arguments
trans-unit.target: 具有两个类型参数的泛型类型

trans-unit.source: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`2[MyType,AnotherType]")`
trans-unit.target: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`2[MyType,AnotherType]")`

trans-unit.source: A generic type with two assembly-qualified type arguments
trans-unit.target: 具有两个程序集限定类型参数的泛型类型

trans-unit.source: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`2[[MyType,MyAssembly],[AnotherType,AnotherAssembly]]")`
trans-unit.target: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`2[[MyType,MyAssembly],[AnotherType,AnotherAssembly]]")`

trans-unit.source: An assembly-qualified generic type with an assembly-qualified type argument
trans-unit.target: 具有程序集限定的类型自变量的程序集限定的泛型类型

trans-unit.source: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[[MyType,MyAssembly]],MyGenericTypeAssembly")`
trans-unit.target: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[[MyType,MyAssembly]],MyGenericTypeAssembly")`

trans-unit.source: A generic type whose type argument is a generic type with two type arguments
trans-unit.target: 一个其类型参数为具有两个类型参数的泛型类型的泛型类型

trans-unit.source: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[AnotherGenericType`2[MyType,AnotherType]]")`
trans-unit.target: `Type.GetType("MyGenericType`1[AnotherGenericType`2[MyType,AnotherType]]")`

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A class initializer is invoked and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 调用了类初始值设定项，且该项引发了异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and the type is not found.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 是 <see langword="true" />，且找不到该类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> contains invalid characters, such as an embedded tab.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 包含无效字符，例如嵌入的制表符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> represents an array type with an invalid size.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示大小无效的数组类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents an array of <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示 <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" /> 的数组。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> contains invalid syntax.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 是 <see langword="true" />，且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 包含无效的语法。

trans-unit.source: For example, "MyType[,*,]".
trans-unit.target: 例如："MyType[,*,]"。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents a generic type that has a pointer type, a <see langword="ByRef" /> type, or <see cref="T:System.Void" /> as one of its type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示将指针类型、<see langword="ByRef" /> 类型或 <see cref="T:System.Void" /> 作为其类型参数之一的泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents a generic type that has an incorrect number of type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示具有错误的类型参数数目的泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents a generic type, and one of its type arguments does not satisfy the constraints for the corresponding type parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示泛型类型，并且其类型参数之一不满足相应类型参数的约束。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and the assembly or one of its dependencies was not found.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且未找到程序集或程序集的某个依赖项。

trans-unit.source: The assembly or one of its dependencies was found, but could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 找到了程序集或其依赖项之一，但无法加载它们。

trans-unit.source: The assembly or one of its dependencies is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 程序集或其依赖项之一无效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded, and the assembly was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 当前加载的是公共语言运行时 2.0 版或更高版本，而程序集使用更高的版本编译。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>typeResolver</c> parameter is provided, the type name can be any string that <c>typeResolver</c> is capable of resolving.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 <c>typeResolver</c> 参数，则类型名称可以为 <c>typeResolver</c> 能够解析的任何字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>assemblyResolver</c> parameter is provided or if standard type resolution is used, <c>typeName</c> must be an assembly-qualified name (see <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" />), unless the type is in the currently executing assembly or in Mscorlib.dll, in which case it is sufficient to supply the type name qualified by its namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 <c>assemblyResolver</c> 参数，或者使用了标准类型解析，则除非该类型位于当前正在执行的程序集或 Mscorlib.dll 中（在这种情况下足以提供其命名空间所限定的类型名称），否则 <c>typeName</c> 必须为程序集限定的名称（请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" />）。

trans-unit.source: A method that locates and returns the assembly that is specified in <c>typeName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个方法，它定位并返回 <c>typeName</c> 中指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The assembly name is passed to <c>assemblyResolver</c> as an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 对象形式传递给 <c>assemblyResolver</c> 的程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: If <c>typeName</c> does not contain the name of an assembly, <c>assemblyResolver</c> is not called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>typeName</c> 不包含程序集的名称，则不调用 <c>assemblyResolver</c>。

trans-unit.source: If <c>assemblyResolver</c> is not supplied, standard assembly resolution is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 <c>assemblyResolver</c>，则执行标准程序集解析。

trans-unit.source: Caution Do not pass methods from unknown or untrusted callers.
trans-unit.target: 警告 不要通过未知的或不受信任的调用方传递方法。

trans-unit.source: Doing so could result in elevation of privilege for malicious code.
trans-unit.target: 此操作可能会导致恶意代码特权提升。

trans-unit.source: Use only methods that you provide or that you are familiar with.
trans-unit.target: 仅使用你提供或者熟悉的方法。

trans-unit.source: A method that locates and returns the type that is specified by <c>typeName</c> from the assembly that is returned by <c>assemblyResolver</c> or by standard assembly resolution.
trans-unit.target: 一个方法，它在由 <c>assemblyResolver</c> 或标准程序集解析返回的程序集中定位并返回 <c>typeName</c> 所指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: If no assembly is provided, the <c>typeResolver</c> method can provide one.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供任何程序集，则 <c>typeResolver</c> 方法可以提供一个程序集。

trans-unit.source: The method also takes a parameter that specifies whether to perform a case-insensitive search; <see langword="false" /> is passed to that parameter.
trans-unit.target: 该方法还采用一个参数以指定是否执行不区分大小写的搜索；<see langword="false" /> 传递给该参数。

trans-unit.source: Caution Do not pass methods from unknown or untrusted callers.
trans-unit.target: 警告 不要通过未知的或不受信任的调用方传递方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type with the specified name, optionally providing custom methods to resolve the assembly and the type.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定名称的类型，（可选）提供自定义方法以解析程序集和该类型。

trans-unit.source: The type with the specified name, or <see langword="null" /> if the type is not found.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名称的类型，如果未找到该类型，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Usage scenarios for this method and details about the `assemblyResolver` and `typeResolver` parameters can be found in the <xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 为此方法和有关的详细信息的使用方案`assemblyResolver`和`typeResolver`在找不到参数<xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: If `typeName` cannot be found, the call to the <xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%29> method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeName`找不到，对的调用<xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%29>方法返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: It does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 它不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To control whether an exception is thrown, call an overload of the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method that has a `throwOnError` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制是否会引发异常，请调用的重载<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法具有`throwOnError`参数。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method overload is the same as calling the <xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method overload and specifying `false` for the `throwOnError` and `ignoreCase` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法重载是调用相同<xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>方法重载并指定`false`为`throwOnError`和`ignoreCase`参数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A class initializer is invoked and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 调用了类初始值设定项，且该项引发了异常。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when <paramref name="typeName" /> is parsed into a type name and an assembly name (for example, when the simple type name includes an unescaped special character).
trans-unit.target: 当 <paramref name="typeName" /> 分析为类型名称和程序集名称（例如当简单类型名包含未转义的特殊字符）时，将发生错误。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents a generic type that has a pointer type, a <see langword="ByRef" /> type, or <see cref="T:System.Void" /> as one of its type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示将指针类型、<see langword="ByRef" /> 类型或 <see cref="T:System.Void" /> 作为其类型参数之一的泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents a generic type that has an incorrect number of type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示具有错误的类型参数数目的泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents a generic type, and one of its type arguments does not satisfy the constraints for the corresponding type parameter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示泛型类型，并且其类型参数之一不满足相应类型参数的约束。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents an array of <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示 <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" /> 的数组。

trans-unit.source: The assembly or one of its dependencies was found, but could not be loaded.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> contains an invalid assembly name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 包含无效的程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> is a valid assembly name without a type name.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 是不含类型名称的有效程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: The assembly or one of its dependencies is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该程序集或其依赖项之一无效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The assembly was compiled with a later version of the common language runtime than the version that is currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 此程序集使用高于当前所加载版本的公共语言运行时版本编译而成。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>typeResolver</c> parameter is provided, the type name can be any string that <c>typeResolver</c> is capable of resolving.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 <c>typeResolver</c> 参数，则类型名称可以为 <c>typeResolver</c> 能够解析的任何字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>assemblyResolver</c> parameter is provided or if standard type resolution is used, <c>typeName</c> must be an assembly-qualified name (see <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" />), unless the type is in the currently executing assembly or in Mscorlib.dll, in which case it is sufficient to supply the type name qualified by its namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 <c>assemblyResolver</c> 参数，或者使用了标准类型解析，则除非该类型位于当前正在执行的程序集或 Mscorlib.dll 中（在这种情况下足以提供其命名空间所限定的类型名称），否则 <c>typeName</c> 必须为程序集限定的名称（请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName" />）。

trans-unit.source: A method that locates and returns the assembly that is specified in <c>typeName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个方法，它定位并返回 <c>typeName</c> 中指定的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The assembly name is passed to <c>assemblyResolver</c> as an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 对象形式传递给 <c>assemblyResolver</c> 的程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: If <c>typeName</c> does not contain the name of an assembly, <c>assemblyResolver</c> is not called.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>typeName</c> 不包含程序集的名称，则不调用 <c>assemblyResolver</c>。

trans-unit.source: If <c>assemblyResolver</c> is not supplied, standard assembly resolution is performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 <c>assemblyResolver</c>，则执行标准程序集解析。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload and its associated overloads (<xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%29> and <xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%2CSystem.Boolean%29>) to replace the default implementation of the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method with more flexible implementations.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法重载和其关联的重载 (<xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%29>和<xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.AssemblyName%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%7D%2CSystem.Func%7BSystem.Reflection.Assembly%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Type%7D%2CSystem.Boolean%29>) 替换的默认实现<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>具有更灵活的实现方法。

trans-unit.source: By providing your own methods that resolve type names and the names of the assemblies that contain them, you can do the following:
trans-unit.target: 通过提供你自己的方法来解析类型名称和包含它们的程序集的名称，您可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Control which version of an assembly a type is loaded from.
trans-unit.target: 控制哪个版本的一种类型从加载的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Provide another place to look for a type name that does not include an assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 提供另一个位置来查找不包括程序集名称的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Load assemblies using partial assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 加载程序集使用部分程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: Return subclasses of <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType> that are not created by the common language runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: 返回的子类<xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不由公共语言运行时 (CLR)。

trans-unit.source: For example, in version-tolerant serialization this method enables you to search for a "best fit" assembly by using a partial name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在版本容错序列化此方法可通过使用部分名称搜索"best fit"的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Other overloads of the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method require an assembly-qualified type name, which includes the version number.
trans-unit.target: 其他重载<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法需要一个程序集限定类型名称，其中包括的版本号。

trans-unit.source: Alternate implementations of the type system may need to return subclasses of <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType> that are not created by the CLR; all types that are returned by other overloads of the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method are runtime types.
trans-unit.target: 可能需要返回的子类的类型系统的备用实现<xref:System.Type?displayProperty=nameWithType>，不由 CLR; 所有类型的其他重载返回<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法是运行时类型。

trans-unit.source: Usage Notes
trans-unit.target: 用法说明

trans-unit.source: This method overload and its associated overloads parse `typeName` into the name of a type and the name of an assembly, and then resolve the names.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重载和其关联的重载分析`typeName`到的类型和程序集名称的名称，然后解析该名称。

trans-unit.source: Resolution of the assembly name occurs before resolution of the type name, because a type name must be resolved in the context of an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 因为类型名称必须解析程序集的上下文中，程序集名称的解析在类型名称的解析之前发生。

trans-unit.source: If you are unfamiliar with the concept of assembly-qualified type names, see the <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不熟悉的程序集限定类型名称的概念，请参阅<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If `typeName` is not an assembly-qualified name, assembly resolution is skipped.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeName`不是程序集限定名称，跳过程序集解析。

trans-unit.source: Unqualified type names can be resolved in the context of Mscorlib.dll or the currently executing assembly, or you can optionally provide an assembly in the `typeResolver` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 非限定的类型名称可以解决 Mscorlib.dll 或当前正在执行的程序集的上下文中，也可以根据需要提供中的程序集`typeResolver`参数。

trans-unit.source: The effects of including or omitting the assembly name for different kinds of name resolution are displayed as a table in the [Mixed Name Resolution](#mixed_name_resolution) section.
trans-unit.target: 包括或忽略程序集名称，例如，为中的表会显示不同类型的名称解析的影响[混合名称解析](#mixed_name_resolution)部分。

trans-unit.source: General usage notes:
trans-unit.target: 常规用法注释：

trans-unit.source: Do not pass methods to `assemblyResolver` or `typeResolver` if they come from unknown or untrusted callers.
trans-unit.target: 不要将传递到方法`assemblyResolver`或`typeResolver`如果来自未知或不受信任的调用方。

trans-unit.source: Use only methods that you provide or that you are familiar with.
trans-unit.target: 仅使用你提供或者熟悉的方法。

trans-unit.source: Using methods from unknown or untrusted callers could result in elevation of privilege for malicious code.
trans-unit.target: 使用来自未知或不受信任的调用方的方法可能会导致恶意代码特权提升。

trans-unit.source: If you omit the `assemblyResolver` and/or `typeResolver` parameters, the value of the `throwOnError` parameter is passed to the methods that perform the default resolution.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略`assemblyResolver`和/或`typeResolver`参数、 的值`throwOnError`参数传递给执行的默认解析的方法。

trans-unit.source: If `throwOnError` is `true`, this method throws a <xref:System.TypeLoadException> when `typeResolver` returns `null`, and a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> when `assemblyResolver` returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`throwOnError`是`true`，此方法将引发<xref:System.TypeLoadException>时`typeResolver`返回`null`，和一个<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>时`assemblyResolver`返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: This method does not catch exceptions thrown by `assemblyResolver` and `typeResolver`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会捕获引发的异常`assemblyResolver`和`typeResolver`。

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for any exceptions that are thrown by the resolver methods.
trans-unit.target: 你负责由解析程序方法引发任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Resolving Assemblies
trans-unit.target: 解析程序集

trans-unit.source: The `assemblyResolver` method receives an <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> object, which is produced by parsing the string assembly name that is included in `typeName`.
trans-unit.target: `assemblyResolver`方法接收<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>对象，生成的分析中包含的字符串的程序集名称`typeName`。

trans-unit.source: If `typeName` does not contain an assembly name, `assemblyResolver` is not called and `null` is passed to `typeResolver`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeName`不包含程序集名称，`assemblyResolver`不调用和`null`传递给`typeResolver`。

trans-unit.source: If `assemblyResolver` is not supplied, standard assembly probing is used to locate the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果`assemblyResolver`不提供标准的程序集探测用于查找程序集。

trans-unit.source: If `assemblyResolver` is provided, the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method does not do standard probing; in that case you must ensure that your `assemblyResolver` can handle all the assemblies you pass to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果`assemblyResolver`提供，<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法不执行标准探测; 在这种情况下你必须确保你`assemblyResolver`可以处理传递给它的所有程序集。

trans-unit.source: The `assemblyResolver` method should return `null` if the assembly cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: `assemblyResolver`方法应返回`null`如果无法解析的程序集。

trans-unit.source: If `assemblyResolver` returns `null`, `typeResolver` is not called and no further processing occurs; additionally, if `throwOnError` is `true`, a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`assemblyResolver`返回`null`，`typeResolver`不调用且不进行其他处理发生; 此外，如果`throwOnError`是`true`、<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>引发。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> that is passed to `assemblyResolver` is a partial name, one or more of its parts are `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>传递给`assemblyResolver`是部分名称、 一个或多个其部件是`null`。

trans-unit.source: For example, if it has no version, the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Version%2A> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果它具有无版本<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Version%2A>属性是`null`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Version%2A> property, the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CultureInfo%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.GetPublicKeyToken%2A> method all return `null`, then only the simple name of the assembly was supplied.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Version%2A>属性，<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CultureInfo%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.GetPublicKeyToken%2A>方法都返回`null`，然后提供的程序集简单名称。

trans-unit.source: The `assemblyResolver` method can use or ignore all parts of the assembly name.
trans-unit.target: `assemblyResolver`方法可以使用或忽略程序集名称的所有部分。

trans-unit.source: The effects of different assembly resolution options are displayed as a table in the [Mixed Name Resolution](#mixed_name_resolution) section, for simple and assembly-qualified type names.
trans-unit.target: 不同的程序集解析选项的效果将显示为中的表[混合名称解析](#mixed_name_resolution)部分中的，对于简单和程序集限定类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Resolving Types
trans-unit.target: 解析类型

trans-unit.source: If `typeName` does not specify an assembly name, `typeResolver` is always called.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeName`并不指定程序集名称，`typeResolver`始终调用。

trans-unit.source: If `typeName` specifies an assembly name, `typeResolver` is called only when the assembly name is successfully resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeName`指定程序集名称，`typeResolver`仅在已成功解析程序集名称时调用。

trans-unit.source: If `assemblyResolver` or standard assembly probing returns `null`, `typeResolver` is not called.
trans-unit.target: 如果`assemblyResolver`或标准程序集的探查返回`null`，`typeResolver`不调用。

trans-unit.source: The `typeResolver` method receives three arguments:
trans-unit.target: `typeResolver`方法接收三个自变量：

trans-unit.source: The assembly to search or `null` if `typeName` does not contain an assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的程序集或`null`如果`typeName`不包含程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the type.
trans-unit.target: 类型的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a nested type, this is the outermost containing type.
trans-unit.target: 对于嵌套类型，这是最外层包含类型。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a generic type, this is the simple name of the generic type.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型类型，这是泛型类型的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that is `true` if the case of type names is to be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，是`true`如果忽略类型名称的情况。

trans-unit.source: The implementation determines the way these arguments are used.
trans-unit.target: 实现确定这些自变量的使用的方式。

trans-unit.source: The `typeResolver` method should return `null` if it cannot resolve the type.
trans-unit.target: `typeResolver`方法应返回`null`如果无法解析类型。

trans-unit.source: If `typeResolver` returns `null` and `throwOnError` is `true`, this overload of <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> throws a <xref:System.TypeLoadException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeResolver`返回`null`和`throwOnError`是`true`的此重载<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>引发<xref:System.TypeLoadException>。

trans-unit.source: The effects of different type resolution options are displayed as a table in the [Mixed Name Resolution](#mixed_name_resolution) section, for simple and assembly-qualified type names.
trans-unit.target: 不同类型解析选项的效果将显示为中的表[混合名称解析](#mixed_name_resolution)部分中的，对于简单和程序集限定类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Resolving Nested Types
trans-unit.target: 解决嵌套的类型

trans-unit.source: If `typeName` is a nested type, only the name of the outermost containing type is passed to `typeResolver`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`typeName`是嵌套的类型，只有最外面的名称包含类型传递给`typeResolver`。

trans-unit.source: When `typeResolver` returns this type, the <xref:System.Type.GetNestedType%2A> method is called recursively until the innermost nested type has been resolved.
trans-unit.target: 当`typeResolver`返回此类型，<xref:System.Type.GetNestedType%2A>方法以递归方式调用之前的最内部的嵌套的类型已得到解决。

trans-unit.source: Resolving Generic Types
trans-unit.target: 解决泛型类型

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> is called recursively to resolve generic types: First to resolve the generic type itself, and then to resolve its type arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>称为以递归方式来解析泛型类型： 首先，若要解决该泛型类型本身，然后，若要解决其类型自变量。

trans-unit.source: If a type argument is generic, <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> is called recursively to resolve its type arguments, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果类型参数是泛型，<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>称为以递归方式解决其类型参数时，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: The combination of `assemblyResolver` and `typeResolver` that you provide must be capable of resolving all levels of this recursion.
trans-unit.target: 组合`assemblyResolver`和`typeResolver`提供必须能够解析此递归的所有级别。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose you supply an `assemblyResolver` that controls the loading of `MyAssembly`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设你提供`assemblyResolver`控制的加载`MyAssembly`。

trans-unit.source: Suppose you want to resolve the generic type `Dictionary<string, MyType>` (`Dictionary(Of String, MyType)` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 假设你想要解析的泛型类型`Dictionary<string, MyType>`(`Dictionary(Of String, MyType)`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: You might pass the following generic type name:
trans-unit.target: 您可以传递以下泛型类型名称：

trans-unit.source: Notice that `MyType` is the only assembly-qualified type argument.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，`MyType`是仅限定程序集的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The names of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> and <xref:System.String> classes are not assembly-qualified.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>和<xref:System.String>类不是程序集限定。

trans-unit.source: Your `typeResolver` must be able handle either an assembly or `null`, because it will receive `null` for <xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602> and <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 你`typeResolver`必须能够处理或者程序集或`null`，因为它将接收`null`为<xref:System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary%602>和<xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: It can handle that case by calling an overload of the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method that takes a string, because both of the unqualified type names are in Mscorlib.dll:
trans-unit.target: 它可以处理这种情况下，通过调用的重载<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>接受一个字符串，因为这两个非限定的类型名称是 Mscorlib.dll 中的方法：

trans-unit.source: The `assemblyResolver` method is not called for the dictionary type and the string type, because those type names are not assembly-qualified.
trans-unit.target: `assemblyResolver`方法不调用字典类型和字符串类型，因为这些类型名不是程序集限定。

trans-unit.source: Now suppose that instead of `System.String`, the first generic argument type is `YourType`, from `YourAssembly`:
trans-unit.target: 现在假设，而不是`System.String`，第一种泛型自变量类型是`YourType`，从`YourAssembly`:

trans-unit.source: Because this assembly is neither Mscorlib.dll nor the currently executing assembly, you cannot resolve `YourType` without an assembly-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 因为此程序集既 Mscorlib.dll，也没有当前正在执行的程序集，无法解析`YourType`没有程序集限定名。

trans-unit.source: Because your `assemblyResolve` will be called recursively, it must be able to handle this case.
trans-unit.target: 因为你`assemblyResolve`将以递归方式调用，它必须能够处理这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Instead of returning `null` for assemblies other than `MyAssembly`, it now performs an assembly load using the supplied <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> object.
trans-unit.target: 而不是返回`null`以外的其他程序集`MyAssembly`，它现在将执行使用提供程序集加载<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>对象。

trans-unit.source: Back to [Usage Notes](#usage_notes).
trans-unit.target: 返回到[用法说明](#usage_notes)。

trans-unit.source: Resolving Type Names with Special Characters
trans-unit.target: 解析类型名称带有特殊字符

trans-unit.source: Certain characters have special meanings in assembly-qualified names.
trans-unit.target: 某些字符在程序集限定名称中具有特殊含义。

trans-unit.source: If a simple type name contains these characters, the characters cause parsing errors when the simple name is part of an assembly-qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 如果简单类型名称中包含这些字符，字符会导致分析错误的简单名称的程序集限定名称的一部分时。

trans-unit.source: To avoid the parsing errors, you must escape the special characters with a backslash before you can pass the assembly-qualified name to the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免出现分析错误，必须转义的特殊字符以反斜杠之前可以将传递到的程序集限定名称,<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a type is named `Strange]Type`, the escape character must be added ahead of the square bracket as follows: `Strange\]Type`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果名为一种类型`Strange]Type`，转义符必须添加方括号前，如下所示： `Strange\]Type`。

trans-unit.source: Names with such special characters cannot be created in Visual Basic or C#, but can be created by using Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) or by emitting dynamic assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类特殊字符的名称不能在 Visual Basic 或 C# 中，创建，但可以通过使用 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 或发出动态程序集创建。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the special characters for type names.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示作为类型名称的特殊字符。

trans-unit.source: Character
trans-unit.target: 字符

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: 含义

trans-unit.source: `,` (comma)
Delimiter for assembly-qualified names.
trans-unit.target: 程序集限定名称的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: `[]` (square brackets)
As a suffix pair, indicates an array type; as a delimiter pair, encloses generic argument lists and assembly-qualified names.
trans-unit.target: 作为后缀对，该值指示数组类型;作为分隔符对，包含泛型自变量列表和程序集限定名称。

trans-unit.source: `&` (ampersand)
trans-unit.target: `&` （and 符）

trans-unit.source: As a suffix, indicates that a type is a reference type.
trans-unit.target: 作为后缀，该值指示类型是引用类型。

trans-unit.source: `*` (asterisk)
As a suffix, indicates that a type is a pointer type.
trans-unit.target: 作为后缀，该值指示一种类型是指针类型。

trans-unit.source: `+` (plus)
Delimiter for nested types.
trans-unit.target: 对于嵌套类型的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: `\` (backslash)
Escape character.
trans-unit.target: 转义字符。

trans-unit.source: Properties such as <xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A> return correctly escaped strings.
trans-unit.target: 属性，如<xref:System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName%2A>返回正确转义字符串。

trans-unit.source: You must pass correctly escaped strings to the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须传递到正确转义的字符串<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A> method passes correctly escaped names to `typeResolver` and to the default type resolution methods.
trans-unit.target: 反过来，<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A>方法将传递到正确转义的名称`typeResolver`和默认类型解析方法。

trans-unit.source: If you need to compare a name to an unescaped name in `typeResolver`, you must remove the escape characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要进行比较的名称中的非转义名称`typeResolver`，必须删除转义符。

trans-unit.source: Back to [Usage Notes](#usage_notes).
trans-unit.target: 返回到[用法说明](#usage_notes)。

trans-unit.source: Mixed Name Resolution
trans-unit.target: 混合的名称解析

trans-unit.target: 下表总结了之间的交互`assemblyResolver`， `typeResolver`，以及默认名称解析，类型名称和程序集名称中的所有组合`typeName`:

trans-unit.target: 类型名称的内容

trans-unit.target: 程序集冲突解决程序方法

trans-unit.target: 等效于调用<xref:System.Type.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载。

trans-unit.target: `assemblyResolver` 返回的程序集或返回`null`如果无法解析程序集。

trans-unit.source: If the assembly is resolved, the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload is used to load the type from the assembly; otherwise, there is no attempt to resolve the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果程序集解析，<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetType%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载用于加载程序集的类型; 否则，将不尝试解析类型。

trans-unit.target: 等效于将转换到的程序集名称<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>对象，并调用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重载来获取程序集。

trans-unit.source: If the assembly is resolved, it is passed to `typeResolver`; otherwise, `typeResolver` is not called and there is no further attempt to resolve the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果程序集解析，则将它传递到`typeResolver`; 否则为`typeResolver`不调用，并且没有任何进一步的尝试解析类型。

trans-unit.target: 程序集类型

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A class initializer is invoked and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 调用了类初始值设定项，且该项引发了异常。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 是 <see langword="true" />，且找不到该类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> contains invalid characters, such as an embedded tab.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 包含无效字符，例如嵌入的制表符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> represents an array type with an invalid size.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 的值为 <see langword="true" />，且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示大小无效的数组类型。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> represents an array of <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 表示 <see cref="T:System.TypedReference" /> 的数组。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when <paramref name="typeName" /> is parsed into a type name and an assembly name (for example, when the simple type name includes an unescaped special character).
trans-unit.target: 当 <paramref name="typeName" /> 分析为类型名称和程序集名称（例如当简单类型名包含未转义的特殊字符）时，将发生错误。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> is <see langword="true" /> and <paramref name="typeName" /> contains invalid syntax (for example, "MyType[,*,]").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="throwOnError" /> 为 <see langword="true" /> 且 <paramref name="typeName" /> 包含无效的语法（例如，"MyType[,*,]"）。

trans-unit.source: -or-

trans-unit.source: In a decision block inside the `WriteObjectInfo` method, the <xref:System.TypeCode> of an <xref:System.Object> parameter is examined, and an appropriate message is written to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在决策块内中`WriteObjectInfo`方法，<xref:System.TypeCode>的<xref:System.Object>将检查参数，并向控制台写入相应的消息。

trans-unit.source: This method provides the implementation for the `static` (in C#) or `Shared` (in Visual Basic) <xref:System.Type.GetTypeCode%28System.Type%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供的实现`static`（在 C# 中) 或`Shared`（在 Visual Basic)<xref:System.Type.GetTypeCode%28System.Type%29>方法。

trans-unit.target: 继承自<xref:System.Type>，您可以重写该方法以提供您自己的实现<xref:System.Type.GetTypeCode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type associated with the specified class identifier (CLSID).
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定类标识符 (CLSID) 关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: The CLSID of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的 CLSID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type associated with the specified class identifier (CLSID).
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定类标识符 (CLSID) 关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="System.__ComObject" /> regardless of whether the CLSID is valid.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="System.__ComObject" />，无论 CLSID 是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method supports late-bound access to unmanaged COM objects from .NET Framework apps when you know the COM object's class identifier (CLSID).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法支持后期绑定访问到非托管 COM 对象从.NET Framework 应用程序时你知道该 COM 对象的类标识符 (CLSID)。

trans-unit.source: The class identifier for COM classes is defined in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID key of the registry.
trans-unit.target: 在注册表的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID 项定义 COM 类的类标识符。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A> property to determine whether the type returned by this method is a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索的值<xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A>属性来确定此方法返回的类型是否为 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A> method for late-bound access to COM objects whose programmatic identifier (ProgID) you know.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A>方法用于后期绑定访问 COM 对象你知道其编程标识符 (ProgID)。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating an unmanaged COM object from its CLSID is a two-step process:
trans-unit.target: 实例化其 CLSID 从非托管的 COM 对象是一个两步过程：

trans-unit.source: Get a <xref:System.Type> object that represents the`__ComObject` that corresponds to the CLSID by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>对象，表示`__ComObject`对应 CLSID 通过调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to instantiate the COM object.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可实例化 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: See the example for an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅方面的演示示例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%28System.Guid%29> overload ignores any exception that may occur when instantiating a <xref:System.Type> object based on the `clsid` argument.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%28System.Guid%29>重载将忽略在实例化时可能发生的任何异常<xref:System.Type>对象基于`clsid`自变量。

trans-unit.source: Note that no exception is thrown if `clsid` is not found in the registry.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在引发任何异常`clsid`注册表中找不到。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the CLSID of the Microsoft Word [Application object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx) to retrieve a COM type that represents the Microsoft Word application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 Microsoft Word 的 CLSID[应用程序对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx)来检索表示 Microsoft Word 应用程序的 COM 类型。

trans-unit.source: It then instantiates the type by calling the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and closes it by calling the [Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx) method.
trans-unit.target: 它然后实例化类型通过调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并通过调用关闭它[Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx)方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when working with COM objects, not with .NET Framework objects.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 COM 对象，不与.NET Framework 对象时，此方法旨在供使用。

trans-unit.source: All managed objects, including those that are visible to COM (that is, their <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute" /> attribute is <see langword="true" />) have a GUID that is returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.GUID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 所有托管对象，包括对 COM 可见 (即，其<see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute" />属性是<see langword="true" />) 有 GUID 返回<see cref="P:System.Type.GUID" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Although the method returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that corresponds to the GUID for .NET Framework objects, you can't use that <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object to create a type instance by calling the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该方法返回<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象对应的.NET Framework 的 GUID 的对象，则无法使用此<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象来创建的类型实例方法调用<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> should only be used to retrieve the GUID of an unmanaged COM object, and the resulting <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method must represent an unmanaged COM object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" />应仅用于检索的非托管的 COM 对象，并且生成的 GUID<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象传递给<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法必须表示非托管的 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: The CLSID of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的 CLSID。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to throw any exception that occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 将引发所发生的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to ignore any exception that occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 将忽略所发生的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type associated with the specified class identifier (CLSID), specifying whether to throw an exception if an error occurs while loading the type.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定类标识符 (CLSID) 关联的类型，指定在加载该类型时如果发生错误是否引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="System.__ComObject" /> regardless of whether the CLSID is valid.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="System.__ComObject" />，无论 CLSID 是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method supports late-bound access to unmanaged COM objects from .NET Framework apps when you know the COM object's class identifier (CLSID).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法支持后期绑定访问到非托管 COM 对象从.NET Framework 应用程序时你知道该 COM 对象的类标识符 (CLSID)。

trans-unit.source: The class identifier for COM classes is defined in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID key of the registry.
trans-unit.target: 在注册表的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID 项定义 COM 类的类标识符。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A> property to determine whether the type returned by this method is a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索的值<xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A>属性来确定此方法返回的类型是否为 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A> method for late-bound access to COM objects whose programmatic identifier (ProgID) you know.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A>方法用于后期绑定访问 COM 对象你知道其编程标识符 (ProgID)。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating an unmanaged COM object from its CLSID is a two-step process:
trans-unit.target: 实例化其 CLSID 从非托管的 COM 对象是一个两步过程：

trans-unit.source: Get a <xref:System.Type> object that represents the `__ComObject` that corresponds to the CLSID by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>对象，表示`__ComObject`对应 CLSID 通过调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to instantiate the COM object.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可实例化 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: See the example for an illustration.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅方面的演示示例。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions such as <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> will be thrown when specifying `true` for `throwOnError`, but it will not fail for unregistered CLSIDs.
trans-unit.target: 如异常<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>时指定，将引发`true`为`throwOnError`，但它不会为未注册的 Clsid。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the CLSID of the Microsoft Word [Application object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx) to retrieve a COM type that represents the Microsoft Word application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 Microsoft Word 的 CLSID[应用程序对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx)来检索表示 Microsoft Word 应用程序的 COM 类型。

trans-unit.source: It then instantiates the type by calling the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and closes it by calling the [Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx) method.
trans-unit.target: 它然后实例化类型通过调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并通过调用关闭它[Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx)方法。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if an error occurs while loading the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果在加载该类型时发生错误，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when working with COM objects, not with .NET Framework objects.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 COM 对象，不与.NET Framework 对象时，此方法旨在供使用。

trans-unit.source: All managed objects, including those that are visible to COM (that is, their <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute" /> attribute is <see langword="true" />) have a GUID that is returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.GUID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 所有托管对象，包括对 COM 可见 (即，其<see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute" />属性是<see langword="true" />) 有 GUID 返回<see cref="P:System.Type.GUID" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Although the method returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that corresponds to the GUID for .NET Framework objects, you can't use that <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object to create a type instance by calling the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该方法返回<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象对应的.NET Framework 的 GUID 的对象，则无法使用此<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象来创建的类型实例方法调用<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> should only be used to retrieve the GUID of an unmanaged COM object, and the resulting <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method must represent an unmanaged COM object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" />应仅用于检索的非托管的 COM 对象，并且生成的 GUID<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象传递给<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法必须表示非托管的 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: The CLSID of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的 CLSID。

trans-unit.source: The server from which to load the type.
trans-unit.target: 用于从中加载该类型的服务器。

trans-unit.source: If the server name is <see langword="null" />, this method automatically reverts to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器名称为 <see langword="null" />，则此方法会自动恢复到本地计算机上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type associated with the specified class identifier (CLSID) from the specified server.
trans-unit.target: 从指定服务器获取与指定类标识符 (CLSID) 关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="System.__ComObject" /> regardless of whether the CLSID is valid.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="System.__ComObject" />，无论 CLSID 是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method supports late-bound access to unmanaged COM objects from .NET Framework apps when you know the COM object's class identifier (CLSID).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法支持后期绑定访问到非托管 COM 对象从.NET Framework 应用程序时你知道该 COM 对象的类标识符 (CLSID)。

trans-unit.source: The class identifier for COM classes is defined in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID key of the registry.
trans-unit.target: 在注册表的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID 项定义 COM 类的类标识符。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A> property to determine whether the type returned by this method is a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索的值<xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A>属性来确定此方法返回的类型是否为 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A> method for late-bound access to COM objects whose programmatic identifier (ProgID) you know.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A>方法用于后期绑定访问 COM 对象你知道其编程标识符 (ProgID)。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating an unmanaged COM object from its CLSID is a two-step process:
trans-unit.target: 实例化其 CLSID 从非托管的 COM 对象是一个两步过程：

trans-unit.source: Get a <xref:System.Type> object that represents the `__ComObject` that corresponds to the CLSID by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>对象，表示`__ComObject`对应 CLSID 通过调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to instantiate the COM object.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可实例化 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the CLSID of the Microsoft Word [Application object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx) to retrieve a COM type that represents the Microsoft Word application from a server named computer17.central.contoso.com. It then instantiates the type by calling the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and closes it by calling the [Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx) method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 Microsoft Word 的 CLSID[应用程序对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx)来检索表示中名为 computer17.central.contoso.com 的服务器的 Microsoft Word 应用程序的 COM 类型。它然后实例化类型通过调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并通过调用关闭它[Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx)方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when working with COM objects, not with .NET Framework objects.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 COM 对象，不与.NET Framework 对象时，此方法旨在供使用。
