trans-unit.target: 所有托管对象，包括对 COM 可见 (即，其<see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute" />属性是<see langword="true" />) 有 GUID 返回<see cref="P:System.Type.GUID" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Although the method returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that corresponds to the GUID for .NET Framework objects, you can't use that <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object to create a type instance by calling the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该方法返回<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象对应的.NET Framework 的 GUID 的对象，则无法使用此<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象来创建的类型实例方法调用<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> should only be used to retrieve the GUID of an unmanaged COM object, and the resulting <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method must represent an unmanaged COM object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" />应仅用于检索的非托管的 COM 对象，并且生成的 GUID<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象传递给<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法必须表示非托管的 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: The CLSID of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的 CLSID。

trans-unit.source: The server from which to load the type.
trans-unit.target: 用于从中加载该类型的服务器。

trans-unit.source: If the server name is <see langword="null" />, this method automatically reverts to the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器名称为 <see langword="null" />，则此方法会自动恢复到本地计算机上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to throw any exception that occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 将引发所发生的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to ignore any exception that occurs.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 将忽略所发生的任何异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type associated with the specified class identifier (CLSID) from the specified server, specifying whether to throw an exception if an error occurs while loading the type.
trans-unit.target: 从指定服务器获取与指定类标识符 (CLSID) 关联的类型，指定在加载该类型时如果发生错误是否引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="System.__ComObject" /> regardless of whether the CLSID is valid.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="System.__ComObject" />，无论 CLSID 是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method supports late-bound access to unmanaged COM objects from .NET Framework apps when you know the COM object's class identifier (CLSID).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法支持后期绑定访问到非托管 COM 对象从.NET Framework 应用程序时你知道该 COM 对象的类标识符 (CLSID)。

trans-unit.source: The class identifier for COM classes is defined in the HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID key of the registry.
trans-unit.target: 在注册表的 HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\CLSID 项定义 COM 类的类标识符。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the value of the <xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A> property to determine whether the type returned by this method is a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检索的值<xref:System.Type.IsCOMObject%2A>属性来确定此方法返回的类型是否为 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A> method for late-bound access to COM objects whose programmatic identifier (ProgID) you know.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromProgID%2A>方法用于后期绑定访问 COM 对象你知道其编程标识符 (ProgID)。

trans-unit.source: Instantiating an unmanaged COM object from its CLSID is a two-step process:
trans-unit.target: 实例化其 CLSID 从非托管的 COM 对象是一个两步过程：

trans-unit.source: Get a <xref:System.Type> object that represents the `__ComObject` that corresponds to the CLSID by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>对象，表示`__ComObject`对应 CLSID 通过调用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to instantiate the COM object.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%28System.Type%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法可实例化 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions such as <xref:System.OutOfMemoryException> will be thrown when specifying `true` for `throwOnError`, but it will not fail for unregistered CLSIDs.
trans-unit.target: 如异常<xref:System.OutOfMemoryException>时指定，将引发`true`为`throwOnError`，但它不会为未注册的 Clsid。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the CLSID of the Microsoft Word [Application object](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx) to retrieve a COM type that represents the Microsoft Word application from a server named computer17.central.contoso.com. It then instantiates the type by calling the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and closes it by calling the [Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx) method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 Microsoft Word 的 CLSID[应用程序对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff838565.aspx)来检索表示中名为 computer17.central.contoso.com 的服务器的 Microsoft Word 应用程序的 COM 类型。它然后实例化类型通过调用<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并通过调用关闭它[Application.Quit](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/office/ff844895.aspx)方法。

trans-unit.source: An exception is thrown if an error occurs while loading the type.
trans-unit.target: 如果在加载该类型时发生错误，将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use when working with COM objects, not with .NET Framework objects.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 COM 对象，不与.NET Framework 对象时，此方法旨在供使用。

trans-unit.source: All managed objects, including those that are visible to COM (that is, their <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute" /> attribute is <see langword="true" />) have a GUID that is returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.GUID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 所有托管对象，包括对 COM 可见 (即，其<see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisibleAttribute" />属性是<see langword="true" />) 有 GUID 返回<see cref="P:System.Type.GUID" />属性。

trans-unit.source: Although the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> method returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that corresponds to the GUID for a particular managed object, you can't use that <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object to create a type instance by calling the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" />方法返回<see cref="T:System.Type" />对应于为特定的托管对象的 GUID 对象，则无法使用此<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象来创建的类型实例方法调用<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法，如下面的示例显示。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" /> should only be used to retrieve the GUID of an unmanaged COM object, and the resulting <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that is passed to the <see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" /> method must represent an unmanaged COM object.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeFromCLSID(System.Guid,System.String,System.Boolean)" />应仅用于检索的非托管的 COM 对象，并且生成的 GUID<see cref="T:System.Type" />对象传递给<see cref="M:System.Activator.CreateInstance(System.Type)" />方法必须表示非托管的 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object that refers to the type.
trans-unit.target: 引用类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type referenced by the specified type handle.
trans-unit.target: 获取由指定类型句柄引用的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type referenced by the specified <see cref="T:System.RuntimeTypeHandle" />, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="P:System.RuntimeTypeHandle.Value" /> property of <paramref name="handle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.RuntimeTypeHandle" /> 的 <see langword="null" /> 属性为 <see cref="P:System.RuntimeTypeHandle.Value" />，则为由指定的 <paramref name="handle" /> 引用的类型，或者为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The handles are valid only in the application domain in which they were obtained.
trans-unit.target: 句柄仅在获取它们的应用程序域中是有效的。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromHandle%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Type> object from a <xref:System.RuntimeTypeHandle> provided by the <xref:System.Type.GetTypeHandle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Type.GetTypeFromHandle%2A>方法以获取<xref:System.Type>对象<xref:System.RuntimeTypeHandle>由<xref:System.Type.GetTypeHandle%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A class initializer is invoked and throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 调用了类初始值设定项，且该项引发了异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type associated with the specified program identifier (ProgID).
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定程序标识符 (ProgID) 关联的类型。

trans-unit.source: The ProgID of the type to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的类型的 ProgID。

trans-unit.target: 获取与指定程序标识符 (ProgID) 关联的类型，如果在加载 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 时遇到错误，则返回空值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the handle for the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of a specified object.

trans-unit.source: The following example defines the class `MyClass1`, gets an instance of it, and retrieves the runtime handle of the object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义类`MyClass1`，获取它的实例并检索对象的运行时句柄。

trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 关联的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID associated with the <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 关联的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: A GUID is associated with a type using the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: GUID 是与类型使用相关联<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates the class `MyClass1` with a public method, creates a `Type` object corresponding to `MyClass1`, and gets the <xref:System.Guid> structure using the `GUID` property of the `Type` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建类`MyClass1`具有公共方法，创建`Type`对象对应于`MyClass1`，并获取<xref:System.Guid>结构使用`GUID`属性`Type`类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> encompasses or refers to another type; that is, whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array, a pointer, or is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是包含还是引用另一类型，即当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是数组、指针还是通过引用传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array, a pointer, or is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 为数组、指针或按引用传递，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, Type.GetType("Int32[]").HasElementType returns `true`, but Type.GetType("Int32").HasElementType returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Type.GetType("Int32[]")。HasElementType 返回`true`，但 Type.GetType("Int32")。HasElementType 返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: HasElementType also returns `true` for "Int32*" and "Int32&".
trans-unit.target: HasElementType 也会返回`true`为"Int32 *"和"Int32 （& a)"。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a generic type, or a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或类型参数的泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example returns `true` or `false` depending on whether or not the object is an array, a reference type, or a pointer.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例返回`true`或`false`取决于该对象是否为数组、 引用类型或指针。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, implements the <see cref="P:System.Type.HasElementType" /> property and determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> encompasses or refers to another type; that is, whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array, a pointer, or is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，实现 <see cref="P:System.Type.HasElementType" /> 属性，确定当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否包含另一类型或对其引用；即，当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否是数组、指针或由引用传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array, a pointer, or is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 为数组、指针或按引用传递，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, Type.GetType("Int32[]").HasElementTypeImpl returns `true`, but Type.GetType("Int32").HasElementTypeImpl returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Type.GetType("Int32[]")。HasElementTypeImpl 返回`true`，但 Type.GetType("Int32")。HasElementTypeImpl 返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: HasElementTypeImpl also returns `true` for "Int32*" and "Int32&".
trans-unit.target: HasElementTypeImpl 也会返回`true`为"Int32 *"和"Int32 （& a)"。

trans-unit.source: The following example defines the class `MyTypeDelegator`, which overrides the `HasElementTypeImpl` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例定义类`MyTypeDelegator`，值将覆盖`HasElementTypeImpl`方法。

trans-unit.source: The main class checks for the `HasElementType` property and displays the element type.
trans-unit.target: 主类检查`HasElementType`属性并显示的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a specific member of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的特定成员。

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the constructor, method, property, or field member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，它包含要调用的构造函数、方法、属性或字段成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty string ("") to invoke the default member.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串 ("")，表示调用默认成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="IDispatch" /> members, a string representing the DispID, for example "[DispID=3]".
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see langword="IDispatch" /> 成员，则为一个表示 DispID 的字符串，例如"[DispID=3]"。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: The access can be one of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> such as <see langword="Public" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, <see langword="Private" />, <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 访问可以是 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 之一，如 <see langword="Public" />、<see langword="NonPublic" />、<see langword="Private" />、<see langword="InvokeMethod" /> 和 <see langword="GetField" /> 等。

trans-unit.source: The type of lookup need not be specified.
trans-unit.target: 查找类型无需指定。

trans-unit.source: If the type of lookup is omitted, <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Static" /> are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略查找的类型，则将使用 <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Static" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，该对象定义一组属性并启用绑定，而绑定可能涉及选择重载方法、强制参数类型和通过反射调用成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), to use the <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 <see langword="Nothing" /> 的空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />）。

trans-unit.source: Note that explicitly defining a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object may be required for successfully invoking method overloads with variable arguments.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，为了成功地使用变量参数来调用方法重载，可能必须显式定义 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 对其调用指定成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 包含传递给要调用的成员的参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified member, using the specified binding constraints and matching the specified argument list.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的绑定约束并匹配指定的自变量列表，调用指定成员。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示被调用成员的返回值。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A> to invoke a generic method.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A>调用泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的成员：

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private and protected members) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`在搜索中包括非公共成员 （即，专用和受保护成员）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include static members up the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括层次结构向上的静态成员。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not members that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的成员<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的成员。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> invocation flags can be used to denote what action to take with the member:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>调用标志可以用于表示要与成员执行的操作：

trans-unit.source: `CreateInstance` to invoke a constructor.
trans-unit.target: `CreateInstance` 若要调用构造函数。

trans-unit.source: `name` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `name` 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with other invocation flags.
trans-unit.target: 与其他调用标志无效。

trans-unit.source: `InvokeMethod` to invoke a method, but not a constructor or a type initializer.
trans-unit.target: `InvokeMethod` 若要调用方法，但不是构造函数或类型初始值设定项。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetField` or `SetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetField`或`SetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: If `InvokeMethod` is specified by itself, `BindingFlags.Public`, `BindingFlags.Instance`, and `BindingFlags.Static` are automatically included.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InvokeMethod`本身，指定`BindingFlags.Public`， `BindingFlags.Instance`，和`BindingFlags.Static`会自动包括。

trans-unit.source: `GetField` to get the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: `GetField` 若要获取的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetField`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetField`。

trans-unit.source: `SetField` to set the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: `SetField` 若要设置的字段值。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `GetField`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`GetField`。

trans-unit.source: `GetProperty` to get a property.
trans-unit.target: `GetProperty` 若要获取的属性。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: `SetProperty` to set a property.
trans-unit.target: `SetProperty` 若要设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `GetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`GetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A method will be invoked if both of the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 如果以下条件都成立，则将调用一个方法：

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the `args` array (unless default arguments are defined on the member and `BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding` is specified).
trans-unit.target: 方法声明中的参数的数目等于中的参数数目`args`数组 (除非成员上定义了默认参数和`BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding`指定)。

trans-unit.source: The type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个自变量的类型可以转换由参数的类型联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The binder will find all of the matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 联编程序将查找所有匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods are found based upon the type of binding requested (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> values `InvokeMethod`, `GetProperty`, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 这些方法找到基于请求的绑定类型 (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>值`InvokeMethod`， `GetProperty`，依次类推)。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder.
trans-unit.target: 按名称、 数量的参数和一组绑定器中定义的搜索修饰符进行筛选的方法集。

trans-unit.source: After the method is selected, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 选择方法后，它被调用。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility is checked at that point.
trans-unit.target: 此时，检查可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The search may control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method.
trans-unit.target: 搜索可能基于与该方法关联的可访问性属性来控制搜索哪些方法集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the <xref:System.Reflection.Binder> class is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Binder>类负责选择要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default binder selects the most specific match.
trans-unit.target: 默认的联编程序选择最精确的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code; that is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through <xref:System.Reflection> whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 对于完全受信任的代码; 忽略访问限制也就是说，可以访问并通过调用的私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性<xref:System.Reflection>每当的代码是完全受信任。

trans-unit.source: You can use `Type.InvokeMember` to set a field to a particular value by specifying <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`Type.InvokeMember`将字段设置为特定值，通过指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to set a public instance field named F on class C, and F is a `String`, you can use code such as:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要设置 C 和 F 的类上名为 F 的公共实例字段是`String`，你可以使用如下代码：

trans-unit.source: If F is a `String[]`, you can use code such as:
trans-unit.target: 如果 F `String[]`，你可以使用如下代码：

trans-unit.source: which will initialize the field F to this new array.
trans-unit.target: 这将初始化到该新数组的字段 F。

trans-unit.source: You can also use `Type.InvokeMember` to set a position in an array by supplying the index of the value and then the next value by using code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用`Type.InvokeMember`设置通过使用类似以下的代码中提供的值，然后选择下一步的值的索引的数组中的位置：

trans-unit.source: This will change string "z" in the array that F holds to string "b".
trans-unit.target: 这将更改 F 包含字符串"b"数组中的字符串"z"。

trans-unit.source: When you invoke an `IDispatch` member, you can specify the DispID instead of the member name, using the string format "[DispID=##]".
trans-unit.target: 当调用`IDispatch`成员，你可以指定而不是成员名称，使用字符串格式的 DispID"[DispID = # #]"。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the DispID of MyComMethod is 3, you can specify the string "[DispID=3]" instead of "MyComMethod".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 DispID MyComMethod 为 3，你可以指定字符串"[DispID = 3]"而不是"MyComMethod"。

trans-unit.source: Invoking a member by DispID is faster than looking up the member by name.
trans-unit.target: 调用成员的 DispID 比速度快按名称查找成员。

trans-unit.source: In complex aggregation scenarios, the DispID is sometimes the only way to invoke the desired member.
trans-unit.target: 在复杂的聚合方案中，DispID 有时是调用所需的成员的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)
trans-unit.target: (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses `InvokeMember` to access members of a type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用`InvokeMember`访问成员的类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> does not contain <see langword="CreateInstance" /> and <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不包含 <see langword="CreateInstance" />，并且 <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> does not contain one of the following binding flags: <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不包含以下某个绑定标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="CreateInstance" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="CreateInstance" /> combined with <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="CreateInstance" /> 与 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" /> 的组合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains both <see langword="GetField" /> and <see langword="SetField" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 同时包含 <see langword="GetField" /> 和 <see langword="SetField" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains both <see langword="GetProperty" /> and <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 同时包含 <see langword="GetProperty" /> 和 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="InvokeMethod" /> combined with <see langword="SetField" /> or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="InvokeMethod" /> 与 <see langword="SetField" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" /> 的组合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="SetField" /> and <paramref name="args" /> has more than one element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="SetField" />，并且 <paramref name="args" /> 具有多个元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This method is called on a COM object and one of the following binding flags was not passed in: <see langword="BindingFlags.InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.GetProperty" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.SetProperty" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.PutDispProperty" />, or <see langword="BindingFlags.PutRefDispProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 COM 对象调用了此方法，但以下绑定标志中有一个未传入：<see langword="BindingFlags.InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.GetProperty" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.SetProperty" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.PutDispProperty" /> 或 <see langword="BindingFlags.PutRefDispProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the named parameter arrays contains a string that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个命名参数数组包含一个值为 <see langword="null" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The specified member is a class initializer.
trans-unit.target: 指定的成员是类初始值设定项。

trans-unit.source: The field or property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: No method can be found that matches the arguments in <paramref name="args" />.
trans-unit.target: 找不到与 <paramref name="args" /> 中的参数匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object represents a type that contains open type parameters, that is, <see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象表示包含开放类型参数的类型，也就是说，<see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified member cannot be invoked on <paramref name="target" />.
trans-unit.target: 不能在 <paramref name="target" /> 上调用指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: More than one method matches the binding criteria.
trans-unit.target: 多个方法与绑定条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Compact Framework does not currently support this method.
trans-unit.target: .NET Compact Framework 当前不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: The method represented by <paramref name="name" /> has one or more unspecified generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="name" /> 表示的方法具有一个或多个未指定的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: That is, the method's <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ContainsGenericParameters" /> property returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，此方法的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 属性将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for accessing non-public members regardless of their grant set.
trans-unit.target: 对于访问而不考虑其授予非公共成员设置。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the constructor, method, property, or field member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，它包含要调用的构造函数、方法、属性或字段成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty string ("") to invoke the default member.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串 ("")，表示调用默认成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="IDispatch" /> members, a string representing the DispID, for example "[DispID=3]".
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see langword="IDispatch" /> 成员，则为一个表示 DispID 的字符串，例如"[DispID=3]"。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: The access can be one of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> such as <see langword="Public" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, <see langword="Private" />, <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 访问可以是 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 之一，如 <see langword="Public" />、<see langword="NonPublic" />、<see langword="Private" />、<see langword="InvokeMethod" /> 和 <see langword="GetField" /> 等。

trans-unit.source: The type of lookup need not be specified.
trans-unit.target: 查找类型无需指定。

trans-unit.source: If the type of lookup is omitted, <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Static" /> are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略查找的类型，则将使用 <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Static" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，该对象定义一组属性并启用绑定，而绑定可能涉及选择重载方法、强制参数类型和通过反射调用成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), to use the <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 <see langword="Nothing" /> 的空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />）。

trans-unit.source: Note that explicitly defining a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object may be required for successfully invoking method overloads with variable arguments.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，为了成功地使用变量参数来调用方法重载，可能必须显式定义 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 对其调用指定成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 包含传递给要调用的成员的参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: The object representing the globalization locale to use, which may be necessary for locale-specific conversions, such as converting a numeric <see cref="T:System.String" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示要使用的全局化区域设置的对象，它对区域设置特定的转换可能是必需的，比如将数字 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 转换为 <see cref="T:System.Double" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the current thread's <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 要使用当前线程的 <see langword="Nothing" /> 的空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />）。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the specified member, using the specified binding constraints and matching the specified argument list and culture.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的绑定约束和匹配的指定参数列表及区域性来调用指定成员。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示被调用成员的返回值。

trans-unit.source: Although the default binder does not process <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> (the `culture` parameter), you can use the abstract <xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType> class to write a custom binder that does process `culture`.
trans-unit.target: 虽然默认的联编程序不处理<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>(`culture`参数)，你可以使用抽象<xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType>类编写的自定义的联编程序`culture`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A> to invoke a generic method.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A>调用泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的成员：

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`在搜索中包括非公共成员 （即，私有、 内部和受保护成员）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include static members up the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括层次结构向上的静态成员。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not members that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的成员<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的成员。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> invocation flags can be used to denote what action to take with the member:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>调用标志可以用于表示要与成员执行的操作：

trans-unit.source: `CreateInstance` to invoke a constructor.
trans-unit.target: `CreateInstance` 若要调用构造函数。

trans-unit.source: `name` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `name` 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with other invocation flags.
trans-unit.target: 与其他调用标志无效。

trans-unit.source: `InvokeMethod` to invoke a method, but not a constructor or a type initializer.
trans-unit.target: `InvokeMethod` 若要调用方法，但不是构造函数或类型初始值设定项。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetField` or `SetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetField`或`SetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: If `InvokeMethod` is specified by itself, `BindingFlags.Public`, `BindingFlags.Instance`, and `BindingFlags.Static` are automatically included.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InvokeMethod`本身，指定`BindingFlags.Public`， `BindingFlags.Instance`，和`BindingFlags.Static`会自动包括。

trans-unit.source: `GetField` to get the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: `GetField` 若要获取的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetField`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetField`。

trans-unit.source: `SetField` to set the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: `SetField` 若要设置的字段值。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `GetField`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`GetField`。

trans-unit.source: `GetProperty` to get a property.
trans-unit.target: `GetProperty` 若要获取的属性。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: `SetProperty` to set a property.
trans-unit.target: `SetProperty` 若要设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `GetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`GetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A method will be invoked if both of the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 如果以下条件都成立，则将调用一个方法：

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the `args` array (unless default arguments are defined on the member and `BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding` is specified).
trans-unit.target: 方法声明中的参数的数目等于中的参数数目`args`数组 (除非成员上定义了默认参数和`BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding`指定)。

trans-unit.source: The type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个自变量的类型可以转换由参数的类型联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The binder will find all of the matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 联编程序将查找所有匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods are found based upon the type of binding requested (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> values `InvokeMethod`, `GetProperty`, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 这些方法找到基于请求的绑定类型 (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>值`InvokeMethod`， `GetProperty`，依次类推)。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder.
trans-unit.target: 按名称、 数量的参数和一组绑定器中定义的搜索修饰符进行筛选的方法集。

trans-unit.source: After the method is selected, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 选择方法后，它被调用。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility is checked at that point.
trans-unit.target: 此时，检查可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The search may control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method.
trans-unit.target: 搜索可能基于与该方法关联的可访问性属性来控制搜索哪些方法集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the <xref:System.Reflection.Binder> class is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Binder>类负责选择要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default binder selects the most specific match.
trans-unit.target: 默认的联编程序选择最精确的匹配。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code; that is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 对于完全受信任的代码; 忽略访问限制也就是说，是在私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性访问而完全受信任代码时，通过反射调用。

trans-unit.source: You can use `Type.InvokeMember` to set a field to a particular value by specifying <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`Type.InvokeMember`将字段设置为特定值，通过指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to set a public instance field named F on class C, and F is a `String` you can use code such as:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要设置 C 和 F 的类上名为 F 的公共实例字段是`String`你可以使用如下代码：

trans-unit.source: If F is a `String[]`, you can use code such as:
trans-unit.target: 如果 F `String[]`，你可以使用如下代码：

trans-unit.source: which will initialize the field F to this new array.
trans-unit.target: 这将初始化到该新数组的字段 F。

trans-unit.source: You can also use `Type.InvokeMember` to set a position in an array by supplying the index of the value and then the next value by using code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用`Type.InvokeMember`设置通过使用类似以下的代码中提供的值，然后选择下一步的值的索引的数组中的位置：

trans-unit.source: This will change string "z" in the array that F holds to string "b".
trans-unit.target: 这将更改 F 包含字符串"b"数组中的字符串"z"。

trans-unit.source: When you invoke an `IDispatch` member you can specify the DispID instead of the member name, using the string format "[DispID=##]".
trans-unit.target: 当调用`IDispatch`成员可以指定而不是成员名称，使用字符串格式的 DispID"[DispID = # #]"。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the DispID of MyComMethod is 3, you can specify the string "[DispID=3]" instead of "MyComMethod".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 DispID MyComMethod 为 3，你可以指定字符串"[DispID = 3]"而不是"MyComMethod"。

trans-unit.source: Invoking a member by DispID is faster than looking up the member by name.
trans-unit.target: 调用成员的 DispID 比速度快按名称查找成员。

trans-unit.source: In complex aggregation scenarios, the DispID is sometimes the only way to invoke the desired member.
trans-unit.target: 在复杂的聚合方案中，DispID 有时是调用所需的成员的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)
trans-unit.target: (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> does not contain <see langword="CreateInstance" /> and <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不包含 <see langword="CreateInstance" />，并且 <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> does not contain one of the following binding flags: <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不包含以下某个绑定标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="CreateInstance" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="CreateInstance" /> combined with <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="CreateInstance" /> 与 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" /> 的组合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains both <see langword="GetField" /> and <see langword="SetField" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 同时包含 <see langword="GetField" /> 和 <see langword="SetField" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains both <see langword="GetProperty" /> and <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 同时包含 <see langword="GetProperty" /> 和 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="InvokeMethod" /> combined with <see langword="SetField" /> or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="InvokeMethod" /> 与 <see langword="SetField" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" /> 的组合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="SetField" /> and <paramref name="args" /> has more than one element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="SetField" />，并且 <paramref name="args" /> 具有多个元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This method is called on a COM object and one of the following binding flags was not passed in: <see langword="BindingFlags.InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.GetProperty" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.SetProperty" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.PutDispProperty" />, or <see langword="BindingFlags.PutRefDispProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 COM 对象调用了此方法，但以下绑定标志中有一个未传入：<see langword="BindingFlags.InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.GetProperty" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.SetProperty" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.PutDispProperty" /> 或 <see langword="BindingFlags.PutRefDispProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the named parameter arrays contains a string that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个命名参数数组包含一个值为 <see langword="null" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The specified member is a class initializer.
trans-unit.target: 指定的成员是类初始值设定项。

trans-unit.source: The field or property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: No method can be found that matches the arguments in <paramref name="args" />.
trans-unit.target: 找不到与 <paramref name="args" /> 中的参数匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object represents a type that contains open type parameters, that is, <see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象表示包含开放类型参数的类型，也就是说，<see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified member cannot be invoked on <paramref name="target" />.
trans-unit.target: 不能在 <paramref name="target" /> 上调用指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: More than one method matches the binding criteria.
trans-unit.target: 多个方法与绑定条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: The method represented by <paramref name="name" /> has one or more unspecified generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="name" /> 表示的方法具有一个或多个未指定的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: That is, the method's <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ContainsGenericParameters" /> property returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，此方法的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 属性将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for accessing non-public members regardless of their grant set.
trans-unit.target: 对于访问而不考虑其授予非公共成员设置。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The string containing the name of the constructor, method, property, or field member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，它包含要调用的构造函数、方法、属性或字段成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An empty string ("") to invoke the default member.
trans-unit.target: 空字符串 ("")，表示调用默认成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: For <see langword="IDispatch" /> members, a string representing the DispID, for example "[DispID=3]".
trans-unit.target: 对于 <see langword="IDispatch" /> 成员，则为一个表示 DispID 的字符串，例如"[DispID=3]"。

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 一个位屏蔽，由一个或多个指定搜索执行方式的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 组成。

trans-unit.source: The access can be one of the <see langword="BindingFlags" /> such as <see langword="Public" />, <see langword="NonPublic" />, <see langword="Private" />, <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 访问可以是 <see langword="BindingFlags" /> 之一，如 <see langword="Public" />、<see langword="NonPublic" />、<see langword="Private" />、<see langword="InvokeMethod" /> 和 <see langword="GetField" /> 等。

trans-unit.source: The type of lookup need not be specified.
trans-unit.target: 查找类型无需指定。

trans-unit.source: If the type of lookup is omitted, <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Static" /> are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略查找的类型，则将使用 <see langword="BindingFlags.Public" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Instance" /> | <see langword="BindingFlags.Static" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that defines a set of properties and enables binding, which can involve selection of an overloaded method, coercion of argument types, and invocation of a member through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，该对象定义一组属性并启用绑定，而绑定可能涉及选择重载方法、强制参数类型和通过反射调用成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic), to use the <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" />.
trans-unit.target: 要使用 <see cref="P:System.Type.DefaultBinder" /> 的空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）。

trans-unit.source: Note that explicitly defining a <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> object may be required for successfully invoking method overloads with variable arguments.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，为了成功地使用变量参数来调用方法重载，可能必须显式定义 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Binder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The object on which to invoke the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 对其调用指定成员的对象。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the arguments to pass to the member to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 包含传递给要调用的成员的参数的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> objects representing the attributes associated with the corresponding element in the <c>args</c> array.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier" /> 对象的数组，表示与 <c>args</c> 数组中的相应元素关联的特性。

trans-unit.source: A parameter's associated attributes are stored in the member's signature.
trans-unit.target: 参数的关联的属性存储在成员的签名中。

trans-unit.source: The default binder processes this parameter only when calling a COM component.
trans-unit.target: 只有在调用 COM 组件时，默认联编程序才处理此参数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object representing the globalization locale to use, which may be necessary for locale-specific conversions, such as converting a numeric String to a Double.
trans-unit.target: 表示要使用的全局化区域设置的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 对象，它对区域设置特定的转换可能是必需的，比如将数字 String 转换为 Double。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the current thread's <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: 要使用当前线程的 <see langword="Nothing" /> 的空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />）。

trans-unit.source: An array containing the names of the parameters to which the values in the <c>args</c> array are passed.
trans-unit.target: 包含参数名称的数组，<c>args</c> 数组中的值将传递给这些参数。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, invokes the specified member, using the specified binding constraints and matching the specified argument list, modifiers and culture.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，使用指定的绑定约束并匹配指定的参数列表、修饰符和区域性，调用指定成员。

trans-unit.source: An object representing the return value of the invoked member.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示被调用成员的返回值。

trans-unit.source: `InvokeMember` calls a constructor member or a method member, gets or sets a property member, gets or sets a data field member, or gets or sets an element of an array member.
trans-unit.target: `InvokeMember` 调用构造函数成员或方法成员、 获取或设置的属性成员、 获取或设置数据字段成员，或获取或设置数组成员的元素。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A> to invoke a generic method.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A>调用泛型方法。

trans-unit.source: When you invoke an `IDispatch` member you can specify the DispID instead of the member name, using the string format "[DispID=##]".
trans-unit.target: 当调用`IDispatch`成员可以指定而不是成员名称，使用字符串格式的 DispID"[DispID = # #]"。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the DispID of MyComMethod is 3, you can specify the string "[DispID=3]" instead of "MyComMethod".
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 DispID MyComMethod 为 3，你可以指定字符串"[DispID = 3]"而不是"MyComMethod"。

trans-unit.source: Invoking a member by DispID is faster than looking up the member by name.
trans-unit.target: 调用成员的 DispID 比速度快按名称查找成员。

trans-unit.source: In complex aggregation scenarios, the DispID is sometimes the only way to invoke the desired member.
trans-unit.target: 在复杂的聚合方案中，DispID 有时是调用所需的成员的唯一方法。

trans-unit.source: Although the default binder does not process <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier> or <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> (the `modifiers` and `culture` parameters), you can use the abstract <xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType> class to write a custom binder that does process `modifiers` and `culture`.
trans-unit.target: 虽然默认的联编程序不处理<xref:System.Reflection.ParameterModifier>或<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>(`modifiers`和`culture`参数)，你可以使用抽象<xref:System.Reflection.Binder?displayProperty=nameWithType>类编写的自定义的联编程序`modifiers`和`culture`.

trans-unit.source: `ParameterModifier` is only used when calling through COM interop, and only parameters that are passed by reference are handled.
trans-unit.target: `ParameterModifier` 当通过 COM 互操作调用，才使用并且可以通过引用传递的参数进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Each parameter in the `namedParameters` array gets the value in the corresponding element in the `args` array.
trans-unit.target: `namedParameters` 数组中的每一个参数获取 `args` 数组中相应元素中的值。

trans-unit.source: If the length of `args` is greater than the length of `namedParameters`, the remaining argument values are passed in order.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `args` 的长度大于 `namedParameters` 的长度，则按顺序传递剩余的参数值。

trans-unit.source: The `namedParameters` array can be used to change the order of arguments in an input array.
trans-unit.target: `namedParameters`数组可以用于更改输入数组中的参数的顺序。

trans-unit.source: For example, given the method `M(string a, int b)` (`M(ByVal a As String, ByVal b As Integer)` in Visual Basic) and the input array `{ 42, "x" }`, the input array can be passed unchanged to `args` if the array `{ "b", "a" }` is supplied for `namedParameters`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，给定方法`M(string a, int b)`(`M(ByVal a As String, ByVal b As Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 和输入的数组`{ 42, "x" }`，输入的数组可以传递不变以`args`如果数组`{ "b", "a" }`为提供`namedParameters`。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> filter flags can be used to define which members to include in the search:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>的筛选器标志可以用于定义要在搜索中包括的成员：

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.Public` to include public members in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.Public`要包含在搜索中的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.NonPublic` to include non-public members (that is, private, internal, and protected members) in the search.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.NonPublic`在搜索中包括非公共成员 （即，私有、 内部和受保护成员）。

trans-unit.source: Specify `BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy` to include static members up the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 指定`BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy`包括层次结构向上的静态成员。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> modifier flags can be used to change how the search works:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>修饰符标志可以用于更改搜索的工作原理：

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` to ignore the case of `name`.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.IgnoreCase` 若要忽略的大小写`name`。

trans-unit.source: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` to search only the members declared on the <xref:System.Type>, not members that were simply inherited.
trans-unit.target: `BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly` 要搜索仅上声明的成员<xref:System.Type>，不只是继承的成员。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> invocation flags can be used to denote what action to take with the member:
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>调用标志可以用于表示要与成员执行的操作：

trans-unit.source: `CreateInstance` to invoke a constructor.
trans-unit.target: `CreateInstance` 若要调用构造函数。

trans-unit.source: `name` is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `name` 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with other invocation flags.
trans-unit.target: 与其他调用标志无效。

trans-unit.source: `InvokeMethod` to invoke a method, but not a constructor or a type initializer.
trans-unit.target: `InvokeMethod` 若要调用方法，但不是构造函数或类型初始值设定项。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetField` or `SetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetField`或`SetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: If `InvokeMethod` is specified by itself, `BindingFlags.Public`, `BindingFlags.Instance`, and `BindingFlags.Static` are automatically included.
trans-unit.target: 如果`InvokeMethod`本身，指定`BindingFlags.Public`， `BindingFlags.Instance`，和`BindingFlags.Static`会自动包括。

trans-unit.source: `GetField` to get the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: `GetField` 若要获取的字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetField`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetField`。

trans-unit.source: `SetField` to set the value of a field.
trans-unit.target: `SetField` 若要设置的字段值。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `GetField`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`GetField`。

trans-unit.source: `GetProperty` to get a property.
trans-unit.target: `GetProperty` 若要获取的属性。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `SetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`SetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: `SetProperty` to set a property.
trans-unit.target: `SetProperty` 若要设置一个属性。

trans-unit.source: Not valid with `GetProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 未有效，且`GetProperty`。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A method will be invoked if both of the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 如果以下条件都成立，则将调用一个方法：

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the `args` array (unless default arguments are defined on the member and `BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding` is specified).
trans-unit.target: 方法声明中的参数的数目等于中的参数数目`args`数组 (除非成员上定义了默认参数和`BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding`指定)。

trans-unit.source: The type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每个自变量的类型可以转换由参数的类型联编程序。

trans-unit.source: The binder will find all of the matching methods.
trans-unit.target: 联编程序将查找所有匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods are found based upon the type of binding requested (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags> values `InvokeMethod`, `GetProperty`, and so on).
trans-unit.target: 这些方法找到基于请求的绑定类型 (<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags>值`InvokeMethod`， `GetProperty`，依次类推)。

trans-unit.source: The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder.
trans-unit.target: 按名称、 数量的参数和一组绑定器中定义的搜索修饰符进行筛选的方法集。

trans-unit.source: After the method is selected, it is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 选择方法后，它被调用。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility is checked at that point.
trans-unit.target: 此时，检查可访问性。

trans-unit.source: The search may control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method.
trans-unit.target: 搜索可能基于与该方法关联的可访问性属性来控制搜索哪些方法集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the <xref:System.Reflection.Binder> class is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Binder.BindToMethod%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法<xref:System.Reflection.Binder>类负责选择要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default binder selects the most specific match.
trans-unit.target: 默认的联编程序选择最精确的匹配。

trans-unit.source: `InvokeMember` can be used to invoke methods with parameters that have default values.
trans-unit.target: `InvokeMember` 可用来调用参数具有默认值的方法。

trans-unit.source: To bind to these methods, Reflection requires <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding?displayProperty=nameWithType> to be specified.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定到这些方法，反射，需要<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.OptionalParamBinding?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定。

trans-unit.source: For a parameter that has a default value, you can either supply a different value, or supply <xref:System.Reflection.Missing.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType> to use the default value.
trans-unit.target: 对于具有默认值参数，你可以提供不同的值，也可以提供<xref:System.Reflection.Missing.Value?displayProperty=nameWithType>可以使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a method such as MyMethod(int x, float y = 2.0).
trans-unit.target: 例如，考虑 MyMethod 之类的方法 (x，float y int = 2.0)。

trans-unit.source: To invoke this method with only the first argument as MyMethod(4), pass one of the above binding flags and pass two arguments, namely, 4 for the first argument and `Missing.Value` for the second argument.
trans-unit.target: 若要调用此方法使用仅 mymethod （4） 作为第一个参数，请将上面的绑定标志之一和传递两个参数，即第一个参数的 4 和`Missing.Value`为第二个参数。

trans-unit.source: Unless you use `Missing.Value`, you may not omit optional parameters with the `Invoke` method.
trans-unit.target: 除非你使用`Missing.Value`，你不能省略可选参数`Invoke`方法。

trans-unit.source: If you must do so, use `InvokeMember` instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果必须这样做，则使用`InvokeMember`相反。

trans-unit.source: Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code; that is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through <xref:System.Reflection> whenever the code is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 对于完全受信任的代码; 忽略访问限制也就是说，可以访问并通过调用的私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性<xref:System.Reflection>每当的代码是完全受信任。

trans-unit.source: You can use `Type.InvokeMember` to set a field to a particular value by specifying <xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用`Type.InvokeMember`将字段设置为特定值，通过指定<xref:System.Reflection.BindingFlags.SetField?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to set a public instance field named F on class C, and F is a `String`, you can use code such as:
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要设置 C 和 F 的类上名为 F 的公共实例字段是`String`，你可以使用如下代码：

trans-unit.source: If F is a `String[]`, you can use code such as:
trans-unit.target: 如果 F `String[]`，你可以使用如下代码：

trans-unit.source: which will initialize the field F to this new array.
trans-unit.target: 这将初始化到该新数组的字段 F。

trans-unit.source: You can also use `Type.InvokeMember` to set a position in an array by supplying the index of the value and then the next value by using code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用`Type.InvokeMember`设置通过使用类似以下的代码中提供的值，然后选择下一步的值的索引的数组中的位置：

trans-unit.source: This will change string "z" in the array that F holds to string "b".
trans-unit.target: 这将更改 F 包含字符串"b"数组中的字符串"z"。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission>与<xref:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.RestrictedMemberAccess?displayProperty=nameWithType>标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。

trans-unit.source: (See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).)
trans-unit.target: (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)

trans-unit.source: To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> does not contain <see langword="CreateInstance" /> and <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不包含 <see langword="CreateInstance" />，并且 <paramref name="name" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="args" /> and <paramref name="modifiers" /> do not have the same length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="args" /> 和 <paramref name="modifiers" /> 的长度不相同。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.BindingFlags" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> does not contain one of the following binding flags: <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="CreateInstance" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 不包含以下某个绑定标志：<see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="CreateInstance" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="CreateInstance" /> combined with <see langword="InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="GetField" />, <see langword="SetField" />, <see langword="GetProperty" />, or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="CreateInstance" /> 与 <see langword="InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="GetField" />、<see langword="SetField" />、<see langword="GetProperty" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" /> 的组合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains both <see langword="GetField" /> and <see langword="SetField" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 同时包含 <see langword="GetField" /> 和 <see langword="SetField" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains both <see langword="GetProperty" /> and <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 同时包含 <see langword="GetProperty" /> 和 <see langword="SetProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="InvokeMethod" /> combined with <see langword="SetField" /> or <see langword="SetProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="InvokeMethod" /> 与 <see langword="SetField" /> 或 <see langword="SetProperty" /> 的组合。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> contains <see langword="SetField" /> and <paramref name="args" /> has more than one element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="invokeAttr" /> 包含 <see langword="SetField" />，并且 <paramref name="args" /> 具有多个元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The named parameter array is larger than the argument array.
trans-unit.target: 命名的参数数组大于参数数组。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: This method is called on a COM object and one of the following binding flags was not passed in: <see langword="BindingFlags.InvokeMethod" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.GetProperty" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.SetProperty" />, <see langword="BindingFlags.PutDispProperty" />, or <see langword="BindingFlags.PutRefDispProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 对 COM 对象调用了此方法，但以下绑定标志中有一个未传入：<see langword="BindingFlags.InvokeMethod" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.GetProperty" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.SetProperty" />、<see langword="BindingFlags.PutDispProperty" /> 或 <see langword="BindingFlags.PutRefDispProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the named parameter arrays contains a string that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个命名参数数组包含一个值为 <see langword="null" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The specified member is a class initializer.
trans-unit.target: 指定的成员是类初始值设定项。

trans-unit.source: The field or property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: No method can be found that matches the arguments in <paramref name="args" />.
trans-unit.target: 找不到与 <paramref name="args" /> 中的参数匹配的方法。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: No member can be found that has the argument names supplied in <paramref name="namedParameters" />.
trans-unit.target: 找不到具有 <paramref name="namedParameters" /> 中提供的参数名称的成员。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object represents a type that contains open type parameters, that is, <see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象表示包含开放类型参数的类型，也就是说，<see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The specified member cannot be invoked on <paramref name="target" />.
trans-unit.target: 不能在 <paramref name="target" /> 上调用指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: More than one method matches the binding criteria.
trans-unit.target: 多个方法与绑定条件匹配。

trans-unit.source: The method represented by <paramref name="name" /> has one or more unspecified generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="name" /> 表示的方法具有一个或多个未指定的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: That is, the method's <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ContainsGenericParameters" /> property returns <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，此方法的 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 属性将返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: for accessing non-public members regardless of their grant set.
trans-unit.target: 对于访问而不考虑其授予非公共成员设置。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 调用非托管的代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is abstract and must be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否为抽象的并且必须被重写。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is abstract; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是抽象的，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsAbstract%2A> property returns `true` in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsAbstract%2A>属性返回`true`在以下情况：

trans-unit.source: The current type is abstract; that is, it cannot be instantiated, but can only serve as the base class for derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型是抽象的;也就是说，它不能实例化，但仅可用作派生类的基类。

trans-unit.source: In C#, abstract classes are marked with the [abstract](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/abstract.md) keyword; in Visual Basic, they are marked with the [MustInherit](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/mustinherit.md) keyword.
trans-unit.target: 在 C# 中，抽象类均未标有[抽象](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/abstract.md)关键字; 在 Visual Basic 中，它们用来标记[MustInherit](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/modifiers/mustinherit.md)关键字。

trans-unit.source: The current type is an interface.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型是接口。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an array of <xref:System.Type> objects that represent the following types:contains type returns `true` if the specified object is `abstract`; otherwise, it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的数组<xref:System.Type>表示以下类型的对象： 包含类型返回`true`的指定的对象是否`abstract`; 否则为它将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: `AbstractClass`, an abstract class (a class marked as `abstract` in C# and `MustInherit` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: `AbstractClass`一个抽象类 (类标记为`abstract`在 C# 和`MustInherit`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: `DerivedClass`, a class that inherits from `AbstractClass`.
trans-unit.target: `DerivedClass`继承自的类`AbstractClass`。

trans-unit.source: `SingleClass`, a non-inheritable class.
trans-unit.target: `SingleClass`非可继承的类。

trans-unit.source: It is defined as `sealed` in C# and `NotInheritable` in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 它将定义为`sealed`在 C# 和`NotInheritable`在 Visual Basic 中。

trans-unit.source: `ITypeInfo`, an interface.
trans-unit.target: `ITypeInfo`一个接口。

trans-unit.source: `ImplementingClass`, a class that implements the `ITypeInfo` interface.
trans-unit.target: `ImplementingClass`一个类以实现`ITypeInfo`接口。

trans-unit.source: The method returns `true` only for `AbstractClass`, the abstract class, and `ITypeInfo`, the interface.
trans-unit.target: 该方法返回`true`仅为`AbstractClass`，抽象类，和`ITypeInfo`，该接口。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the string format attribute <see langword="AnsiClass" /> is selected for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否为 <see langword="AnsiClass" /> 选择了字符串格式属性 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the string format attribute <see langword="AnsiClass" /> is selected for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" /> 选择了字符串格式属性 <see langword="AnsiClass" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.StringFormatMask> selects the string format attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.StringFormatMask>选择字符串格式属性。

trans-unit.source: The string format attributes enhance interoperability by defining how strings should be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 字符串格式属性通过定义字符串的解释方式提高互操作性。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a generic type, this property pertains to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型，此属性与从中构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int>` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int>`(`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由`MyGenericType<T>`。
