trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter of a generic type, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example gets the field information and checks for the `AnsiClass` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例获取字段信息并检查`AnsiClass`属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the type is an array.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示类型是否为数组。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current type is an array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型是数组，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A> property returns `false` for the <xref:System.Array> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A>属性返回`false`为<xref:System.Array>类。

trans-unit.source: It also returns `false` if the current instance is a <xref:System.Type> object that represents a collection type or an interface designed to work with collections, such as <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>.
trans-unit.target: 它还返回`false`如果当前实例是<xref:System.Type>对象，表示集合类型或接口设计为可以使用集合，如<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>。

trans-unit.source: To check for an array, use code such as:
trans-unit.target: 若要检查数组，使用如下代码：

trans-unit.source: If the current type represents a generic type, or a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型表示泛型类型或泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Type.IsArray%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, implements the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsArray" /> property and determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，实现 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsArray" /> 属性并确定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否为数组。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是数组，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Array> class must return `false` because it is an object, not an array.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Array>类必须返回`false`因为它是一个对象，而不是数组。

trans-unit.source: The following example overrides the `IsArrayImpl` method in the `MyTypeDelegator` class, checks if a variable is an array, and displays the result.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例重写`IsArrayImpl`中的方法`MyTypeDelegator`类检查，如果变量是一个数组，并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The type to compare with the current type.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前类型进行比较的类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of a specified type can be assigned to an instance of the current type.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定类型的实例是否能分配给当前类型实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any of the following conditions is true:
trans-unit.target: 如果满足下列任一条件，则为 <see langword="true" />：

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="c" /> and the current instance represent the same type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="c" /> 且当前实例表示相同类型。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="c" /> is derived either directly or indirectly from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="c" /> 是从当前实例直接或间接派生的。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="c" /> is derived directly from the current instance if it inherits from the current instance; <paramref name="c" /> is derived indirectly from the current instance if it inherits from a succession of one or more classes that inherit from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果继承于当前实例，则 <paramref name="c" /> 是从当前实例直接派生的；如果继承于从当前实例继承的接连一个或多个类，则 <paramref name="c" /> 是从当前实例间接派生的。

trans-unit.source: The current instance is an interface that <paramref name="c" /> implements.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例是一个 <paramref name="c" /> 实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="c" /> is a generic type parameter, and the current instance represents one of the constraints of <paramref name="c" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="c" /> 是一个泛型类型参数，并且当前实例表示 <paramref name="c" /> 的约束之一。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the current instance is a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object that represents the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在以下示例中，当前实例是表示 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <c>GenericWithConstraint</c> is a generic type whose generic type parameter must be of type <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>GenericWithConstraint</c> 是一种泛型类型，其泛型类型参数必须为 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: Passing its generic type parameter to the <see cref="M:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom(System.Type)" /> indicates that an instance of the generic type parameter can be assigned to an <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将其泛型类型参数传递到 <see cref="M:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom(System.Type)" /> 表示可以将泛型类型参数的实例分配给 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="c" /> represents a value type, and the current instance represents <c>Nullable<c></c> (<c>Nullable(Of c)</c> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="c" /> 表示一个值类型，并且当前实例表示 <c>Nullable<c></c>（在 Visual Basic 中为 <c>Nullable(Of c)</c>）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if none of these conditions are true, or if <paramref name="c" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不满足上述任何一个条件或者 <paramref name="c" /> 为 <see langword="false" />，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom%2A> method can be used to determine whether an instance of `c` can be assigned to an instance of the current type, The method is most useful when you are handling objects whose types are not known at design time and allows for conditional assignment, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsAssignableFrom%2A>方法可以用于确定实例是否`c`可以分配到当前类型的实例，该方法将处理其类型在设计时未知的对象时最有用，并允许条件赋值，如下面的示例演示。

trans-unit.source: This method thus ensures that a line of code like the following will execute at runtime without throwing an <xref:System.InvalidCastException> exception or a similar exception:
trans-unit.target: 此方法因此可确保的一行代码，如以下将在运行时执行而不引发<xref:System.InvalidCastException>异常或类似的异常：

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: A generic type definition is not assignable from a closed constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型定义不能从封闭式构造类型分配。

trans-unit.source: That is, you cannot assign the closed constructed type `MyGenericList<int>` (`MyGenericList(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) to a variable of type `MyGenericList<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，不能将分配封闭式构造的类型`MyGenericList<int>`(`MyGenericList(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 到类型的变量的`MyGenericList<T>`。

trans-unit.source: If the `c` parameter is of type <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>, the result is based on the type that is to be built.
trans-unit.target: 如果`c`形参属于类型<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder>，结果取决于要生成的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates this using a built type named `B`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示这一使用名为的内置的类型`B`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the `IsAssignableFrom` method using defined classes, integer arrays, and generics.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示`IsAssignableFrom`方法使用定义的类、 整数数组和泛型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the string format attribute <see langword="AutoClass" /> is selected for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否为 <see langword="AutoClass" /> 选择了字符串格式属性 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the string format attribute <see langword="AutoClass" /> is selected for the <see cref="T:System.Type" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" /> 选择了字符串格式属性 <see langword="AutoClass" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.StringFormatMask> selects the string format attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.StringFormatMask>选择字符串格式属性。

trans-unit.source: The string format attributes enhance interoperability by defining how strings should be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: 字符串格式属性通过定义字符串的解释方式提高互操作性。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性适用于从其构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int>` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int>`(`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由`MyGenericType<T>`。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter of a generic type, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the fields of the current type are laid out automatically by the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示当前类型的字段是否由公共语言运行时自动放置的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" /> property of the current type includes <see cref="F:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型的 <see langword="true" /> 属性包括 <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" />，则为 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是为方便起见。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.LayoutMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value to select the type layout attributes, and then test whether <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.LayoutMask?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举值，可以选择的类型布局属性，然后测试是否<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>,<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration values indicate the way the fields of the type are laid out in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举值指示类型的字段在内存中布局的方式。

trans-unit.source: For dynamic types, you can specify <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you create the type.
trans-unit.target: 对于动态类型，你可以指定<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>创建类型时。

trans-unit.source: In code, apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute> attribute with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value to the type, to let the runtime determine the appropriate way to lay out the class.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，应用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>特性与<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Auto?displayProperty=nameWithType>于该类型，以让运行时确定适当的方式进行布局的类的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute> has been applied to a type.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法来确定是否<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>应用于类型。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性适用于从其构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int>` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>.`
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int>`(`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由 `MyGenericType<T>.`

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the type and displays the <xref:System.Type.IsAutoLayout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建类型的实例，并显示<xref:System.Type.IsAutoLayout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否由引用传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 按引用传递，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To get to the actual type, dereference the type that was passed by reference, and then call <xref:System.Type.GetElementType%2A> on that type.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取实际的类型，请取消引用通过引用传递的类型，然后调用<xref:System.Type.GetElementType%2A>对该类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a use of the `IsByRef` property to check whether a specified type is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用`IsByRef`属性检查是否按引用传递指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: The example defines the class `MyTypeDelegator`, which overrides the `HasElementTypeImpl` method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了类`MyTypeDelegator`，值将覆盖`HasElementTypeImpl`方法。

trans-unit.source: The main class checks for the `HasElementType` property and displays the element type.
trans-unit.target: 主类检查`HasElementType`属性并显示的元素类型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, implements the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsByRef" /> property and determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，实现 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsByRef" /> 属性并确定<see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否通过引用传递。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 按引用传递，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a class or a delegate; that is, not a value type or interface.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否是一个类或委托；即，不是值类型或接口。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a class; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是类，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` for classes as well as delegates.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`个类，以及委托。

trans-unit.source: It returns `false` for value types (for structures and enumerations) even if they are boxed.
trans-unit.target: 它将返回`false`的值类型 （结构和枚举） 即使它们装箱。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `true`.If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property returns `true` if the generic type definition is a class definition; that is, it does not define an interface or a value type.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`true`。如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性返回`true`如果泛型类型定义为类定义; 也就是说，它不定义接口或值类型。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` for `Type` instances that represent the <xref:System.Enum> and <xref:System.ValueType> classes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`为`Type`实例表示<xref:System.Enum>和<xref:System.ValueType>类。

trans-unit.source: These two classes are the base types for enumerations and value types, respectively, but they are not enumerations or value types themselves.
trans-unit.target: 这两个类分别枚举的基类型和值类型，但它们不是枚举或值类型本身。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Type.IsValueType%2A> and <xref:System.Type.IsEnum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Type.IsValueType%2A>和<xref:System.Type.IsEnum%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ClassSemanticsMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value distinguishes a type declaration as class or interface.However, both classes and value types are marked with the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Class?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ClassSemanticsMask?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举值区分类型声明为类或接口。但是，类和值类型都标有<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.Class?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you retrieve the value of a type's Attributes property and use the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ClassSemanticsMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> value to determine whether a type is a class instead of a value type, you must also call the <xref:System.Type.IsValueType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果检索的值类型的特性属性并使用<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ClassSemanticsMask?displayProperty=nameWithType>值以确定是否是类型为类而不是值类型，你还必须调用<xref:System.Type.IsValueType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example for the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes> enumeration contains additional information as well as anexample.
trans-unit.target: 例如<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes>枚举包含其他信息，以及 anexample。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否为 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a COM object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 为 COM 对象，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` for COM interfaces because they are not objects.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`为 COM 接口，因为它们不是对象。

trans-unit.source: COM interfaces can be implemented by Microsoft .NET Framework objects.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 Microsoft.NET Framework 对象实现 COM 接口。

trans-unit.source: You can also load a COM class and get a `Type` object for that COM class by using the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) tool.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以加载 COM 类，并获取`Type`为通过使用 COM 该类的对象[Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)工具。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性适用于从其构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int`> (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int`> (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由`MyGenericType<T>`。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, implements the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsCOMObject" /> property and determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a COM object.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，实现 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsCOMObject" /> 属性并确定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否为 COM 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is a COM object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 为 COM 对象，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `false` for COM interfaces because they are not objects.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`false`为 COM 接口，因为它们不是对象。

trans-unit.source: COM interfaces can be implemented by Microsoft .NET Framework objects.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过 Microsoft.NET Framework 对象实现 COM 接口。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this object represents a constructed generic type.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示此对象是否表示构造的泛型类型的值。

trans-unit.source: You can create instances of a constructed generic type.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建构造型泛型类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this object represents a constructed generic type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象表示构造泛型类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A constructed generic type has had explicit types supplied for all of its generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 构造的泛型类型具有为其所有泛型类型参数提供的显式类型。

trans-unit.source: It is also referred to as a closed generic type.
trans-unit.target: 它也称为封闭式泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, you can create instances of the current type; when it is `false`, you can't.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性是`true`，你可以创建的当前类型实例; 它时`false`，你不能。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be hosted in a context.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 在上下文中是否可以被承载。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be hosted in a context; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 能够在某个上下文中承载，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A context intercepts calls to the class members and enforces policies that are applied to the class, such as synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 上下文截获对类成员的调用，并强制实施策略应用于类，如同步。

trans-unit.source: For more detailed information on remoting contexts, see <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细远程上下文的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示`IsContextful`， <xref:System.Type.IsMarshalByRef%2A>，和<xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A>属性<xref:System.Type>类。

trans-unit.source: It checks whether the given type can be hosted in the context, whether it can be marshaled by reference, and whether the type is a primitive data type.
trans-unit.target: 它会检查是否可以封送的引用，以及类型是否为基元数据类型，是否可以在上下文中中, 承载的给定的类型。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsContextful" /> property and determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be hosted in a context.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsContextful" /> 属性并确定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 在上下文中是否可以被承载。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> can be hosted in a context; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 能够在某个上下文中承载，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: A context intercepts calls to the class members and enforce policies that are applied to the class, such as synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 上下文截获对类成员的调用，并强制执行策略应用于类，如同步。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用`IsContextfulImpl`方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否表示枚举。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents an enumeration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see langword="true" /> 表示枚举，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` for an enumeration, but not for the <xref:System.Enum> type itself.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`枚举，但不是能为<xref:System.Enum>类型本身。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性适用于从其构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int>` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int>`(`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由`MyGenericType<T>`。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the `IsEnum` property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用`IsEnum`属性。

trans-unit.source: The value to be tested.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified value exists in the current enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的枚举类型中是否存在指定的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified value is a member of the current enumeration type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值是当前枚举类型的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The current type is not an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当前类型不是一个枚举。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is of a type that cannot be the underlying type of an enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 的类型不能是枚举的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: The COM type that is tested for equivalence with the current type.
trans-unit.target: 要测试是否与当前类型等效的 COM 类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two COM types have the same identity and are eligible for type equivalence.
trans-unit.target: 确定两个 COM 类型是否具有相同的标识，以及是否符合类型等效的条件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the COM types are equivalent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 COM 类型等效，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method also returns <see langword="false" /> if one type is in an assembly that is loaded for execution, and the other is in an assembly that is loaded into the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个类型位于为执行加载的程序集中，而另一个类型位于已加载到仅限反射上下文的程序集中，则此方法也返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime supports the embedding of type information for COM types directly into managed assemblies, instead of requiring the managed assemblies to obtain type information for COM types from interop assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，公共语言运行时支持嵌入 COM 类型的直接为托管程序集，而不是要求互操作从获取 COM 类型的类型信息的托管程序集的类型信息程序集。

trans-unit.source: Because the embedded type information includes only the types and members that are actually used by a managed assembly, two managed assemblies might have very different views of the same COM type.
trans-unit.target: 由于嵌入式类型信息仅包含托管程序集实际使用的类型和成员，因此两个托管程序集可能具有相同 COM 类型的不同视图。

trans-unit.source: Each managed assembly has a different <xref:System.Type> object to represent its view of the COM type.
trans-unit.target: 每个托管程序集都有不同的 <xref:System.Type> 对象来表示其 COM 类型视图。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime supports type equivalence between these different views for interfaces, structures, enumerations, and delegates.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时支持接口、结构、枚举和委托等不同视图之间的类型等效性。

trans-unit.source: Type equivalence means that a COM object that is passed from one managed assembly to another can be cast to the appropriate managed type in the receiving assembly.
trans-unit.target: 类型等效性意味着从一个托管程序集传递到另一个托管程序集的 COM 对象可以转换为接收程序集中适当的托管类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsEquivalentTo%2A> method enables an assembly to determine that a COM object obtained from another assembly has the same COM identity as one of the first assembly's own embedded interop types, and thus can be cast to that type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsEquivalentTo%2A>方法将启用的程序集以确定 COM 对象获取从另一个程序集具有相同的 COM 标识作为第一个程序集的自己嵌入互操作类型之一，并因此可以强制转换为该类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Type Equivalence and Embedded Interop Types](~/docs/framework/interop/type-equivalence-and-embedded-interop-types.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型等效性和嵌入的互操作类型](~/docs/framework/interop/type-equivalence-and-embedded-interop-types.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the fields of the current type are laid out at explicitly specified offsets.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示当前类型的字段是否放置在显式指定的偏移量处的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" /> property of the current type includes <see cref="F:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型的 <see langword="true" /> 属性包括 <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" />，则为 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是为方便起见。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.LayoutMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value to select the type layout attributes, and then test whether <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.LayoutMask?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举值，可以选择的类型布局属性，然后测试是否<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration values indicate the way the fields of the type are laid out in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举值指示类型的字段在内存中布局的方式。

trans-unit.source: For dynamic types, you can specify <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you create the type.
trans-unit.target: 对于动态类型，你可以指定<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>创建类型时。

trans-unit.source: In code, apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute> attribute with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Explicit?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value to the type, to specify that the offsets at which the fields start are specified explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，应用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>特性与<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Explicit?displayProperty=nameWithType>到的类型，以指定显式指定字段开始的偏移量的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute> has been applied to a type.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法来确定是否<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>应用于类型。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性适用于从其构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int>` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int>`(`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由`MyGenericType<T>`。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of a type and displays the value of its <xref:System.Type.IsExplicitLayout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建类型的实例，并显示的值其<xref:System.Type.IsExplicitLayout%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It uses the `MySystemTime` class, which is also in the code example for <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 它使用`MySystemTime`类，该类也是中的代码示例<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or method.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否表示泛型类型或方法的定义中的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object represents a type parameter of a generic type definition or generic method definition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象表示泛型类型定义或泛型方法定义的类型参数，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type> objects that represent generic type parameters can be obtained by calling the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A> method of a <xref:System.Type> object that represents a generic type definition, or the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetGenericArguments%2A> method of a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object that represents a generic method definition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type> 可以通过调用获取对象表示泛型类型参数<xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A>方法<xref:System.Type>对象，表示泛型类型定义，或<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo.GetGenericArguments%2A>方法<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>表示泛型方法的对象定义。

trans-unit.source: For a generic type or method definition, the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> property returns `true` for every element of the resulting array.
trans-unit.target: 对于泛型类型或方法定义<xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>属性返回`true`为每个元素生成的数组。

trans-unit.source: For a closed constructed type or method, the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> property returns `false` for every element of the array returned by the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 封闭式构造的类型或方法，<xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>属性返回`false`返回的数组的每个元素<xref:System.Type.GetGenericArguments%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For an open constructed type or method, some elements of the array might be specific types and others might be type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 开放式构造的类型或方法，该数组的某些元素可能是特定类型和其他人可能是类型参数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> returns `false` for the types and `true` for the type parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> 返回`false`的类型和`true`的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The code example for the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property demonstrates a generic class with a mixture of types and type parameters.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性演示具有混合类型和类型参数的泛型类。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property remarks.
trans-unit.target: 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 属性注解。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> property to test for generic type parameters in a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>属性要测试其泛型类型中的泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current type is a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前类型是否是泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current type is a generic type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果当前类型是泛型类型;否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property to determine whether a <xref:System.Type> object represents a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Type>对象表示泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property to determine whether a <xref:System.Type> object represents an open constructed type or a closed constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Type>对象表示开放构造的类型或封闭式构造的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property returns `false` if the immediate type is not generic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>属性返回`false`如果紧挨的类型不是泛型。

trans-unit.source: For example, an array whose elements are of type `A<int>` (`A(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) is not itself a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，其元素为的类型数组`A<int>`(`A(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 本身不是泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the invariant conditions for common terms used in generic reflection.
trans-unit.target: 下表总结了泛型反射中常用术语的固定条件。

trans-unit.source: Term
trans-unit.target: 术语

trans-unit.source: Invariant
trans-unit.target: 固定条件

trans-unit.source: generic type definition
trans-unit.target: Generic Type Definition — 泛型类型定义

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> 属性为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Defines a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 定义泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: A constructed type is created by calling the <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> method on a <xref:System.Type> object that represents a generic type definition and specifying an array of type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 构造的类型通过调用创建<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>方法<xref:System.Type>对象表示泛型类型定义，并指定一个类型参数的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> can be called only on generic type definitions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> 可以调用仅在泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: Any generic type definition is a generic type (the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property is `true`), but the converse is not true.
trans-unit.target: 任何泛型类型定义是一个泛型类型 (<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>属性是`true`)，但反之不成立。

trans-unit.source: generic type
trans-unit.target: Generic Type — 泛型类型

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 属性为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Can be a generic type definition, an open constructed type, or a closed constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 可以是泛型类型定义、 开放构造的类型或封闭式构造的类型。

trans-unit.source: Note that an array type whose element type is generic is not itself a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 请注意的数组类型的元素类型是泛型本身不是泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: The same is true of a <xref:System.Type> object representing a pointer to a generic type.
trans-unit.target: 这同样适用的<xref:System.Type>对象表示对泛型类型的指针。

trans-unit.source: open constructed type
trans-unit.target: 开放构造的类型

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 属性为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Examples are a generic type that has unassigned type parameters, a type that is nested in a generic type definition or in an open constructed type, or a generic type that has a type argument for which the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 示例包括具有未分配的类型参数的泛型类型，嵌套在泛型类型定义或开放构造类型中的类型或泛型类型具有为其类型自变量<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to create an instance of an open constructed type.
trans-unit.target: 不能创建开放构造类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: Note that not all open constructed types are generic.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，并非所有开放构造的类型是泛型。

trans-unit.source: For example, an array whose element type is a generic type definition is not generic, and a pointer to an open constructed type is not generic.
trans-unit.target: 例如，其元素类型为泛型类型定义的数组不是泛型，并指向开放构造类型的指针不是泛型。

trans-unit.source: closed constructed type
trans-unit.target: 封闭式构造的类型

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 属性为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: When examined recursively, the type has no unassigned generic parameters.
trans-unit.target: 当检查以递归方式，该类型没有任何未分配的泛型参数。

trans-unit.source: generic type parameter
trans-unit.target: Generic Type Parameter — 泛型类型参数

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> 属性为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 属性为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: In a generic type definition, a placeholder for a type that will be assigned later.
trans-unit.target: 在泛型类型定义中，将在以后赋值的类型的占位符。

trans-unit.source: generic type argument
trans-unit.target: Generic Type Argument — 泛型类型变量

trans-unit.source: Can be any type, including a generic type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可以是任何类型，包括泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: Type arguments are specified as an array of <xref:System.Type> objects passed to the <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> method when creating a constructed generic type.
trans-unit.target: 类型自变量被指定为一个数组<xref:System.Type>对象传递给<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>方法创建构造泛型类型时。

trans-unit.source: If instances of the resulting type are to be created, the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property must be `false` for all the type arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果要创建的生成的类型的实例<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性必须为`false`对于所有类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example and table illustrate some of these terms and invariants.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例和表说明了其中的某些条款和固定协定。

trans-unit.source: The `Derived` class is of particular interest because its base type is a constructed type that has a mixture of types and type parameters in its type argument list.
trans-unit.target: `Derived`类是特别感兴趣，因为其基类型是具有其类型自变量列表中的类型和类型参数的构造的类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows examples that use and build on the classes `Base`, `Derived`, and `G`.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了使用和生成的类上`Base`， `Derived`，和`G`。

trans-unit.source: When the C++ and C# code is the same, only one entry is shown.
trans-unit.target: 在 c + + 和 C# 代码都是相同，只有一个条目将显示。

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Invariants
trans-unit.target: 固定协定

trans-unit.source: For this type:
trans-unit.target: 对于此类型：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: For this type:
trans-unit.target: 对于此类型：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> 为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: For the type of variable `d`:
trans-unit.target: 类型的变量`d`:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> is `false` because `d` is an array.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 是`false`因为`d`是数组。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> 为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: `T`, `U`, and `V` (everywhere they appear)
trans-unit.target: `T``U`，和`V`（不管它们出现）

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> is `false` because there is no way to constrain a type parameter to generic types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 是`false`因为没有方法来约束的泛型类型的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> 为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> is `true` because `T`, `U`, and `V` are themselves generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 是`true`因为`T`， `U`，和`V`本身是泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: This does not imply anything about type arguments that are assigned to them later.
trans-unit.target: 这并不意味着有关分配给他们更高版本的类型参数的任何信息。

trans-unit.source: The type of field `F`
trans-unit.target: 字段的类型 `F`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> is `false` because a type has been assigned to the type parameter of `G`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> 是`false`因为类型已分配给类型参数的`G`。

trans-unit.source: Note that this is equivalent to having called the <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，这等效于调用<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> is `true` because the type of field `F` has a type argument that is an open constructed type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 是`true`因为字段的类型`F`具有为开放式构造的类型的类型参数。

trans-unit.source: The constructed type is open because its type argument (that is, `Base`) is a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 构造的类型为开放式因为其类型参数 (即， `Base`) 是泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: This illustrates the recursive nature of the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此关系图演示的递归性质<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The nested class `Nested`
trans-unit.target: 嵌套的类 `Nested`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> is `true`, even though the `Nested` class has no generic type parameters of its own, because it is nested in a generic type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 是`true`，即使`Nested`类具有其自己的任何泛型类型参数，因为它嵌套在泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> 为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: That is, you can call the <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> method and supply the type parameter of the enclosing type, `Derived`.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，可以调用<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>方法并提供、 封闭类型的类型参数`Derived`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> is `true` because the enclosing type, `Derived`, has generic type parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> 是`true`因为封闭类型`Derived`，具有泛型类型参数。

trans-unit.source: This illustrates the recursive nature of the <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此关系图演示的递归性质<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the value of the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>, and <xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A> properties for the types described in the Remarks section.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示的值<xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsGenericParameter%2A>，和<xref:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters%2A>备注部分中描述的类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: For explanations of the property values, see the accompanying table in Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 有关的属性值的说明，请参阅备注中随附的表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> represents a generic type definition, from which other generic types can be constructed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否表示可以用来构造其他泛型类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object represents a generic type definition; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此 <see langword="true" /> 对象表示泛型类型定义，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A generic type definition is a template from which other types can be constructed.
trans-unit.target: 泛型类型定义是可从其构造其他类型的模板。

trans-unit.source: For example, from the generic type definition `G<T>` (expressed in C# syntax; `G(Of T)` in Visual Basic or `generic <typename T> ref class G` in C++) you can construct and instantiate the type `G<int>` (`G(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), by calling the <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> method with a generic argument list containing the <xref:System.Int32> type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，从泛型类型定义`G<T>`（用表示 C# 语法;`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中或`generic <typename T> ref class G`c + + 中) 构造并将其实例化类型`G<int>`(`G(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，通过调用<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>方法替换泛型自变量列表包含<xref:System.Int32>类型。

trans-unit.source: Given a <xref:System.Type> object representing this constructed type, the <xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A> method gets the generic type definition back again.
trans-unit.target: 给定<xref:System.Type>对象表示此构造类型，<xref:System.Type.GetGenericTypeDefinition%2A>方法的泛型类型定义返回重新获得。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> property to determine whether you can create new types from the current type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A>属性来确定是否可以从当前的类型创建新的类型。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A> property returns `true`, you can call the <xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A> method to create new generic types.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Type.IsGenericTypeDefinition%2A>属性返回`true`，可以调用<xref:System.Type.MakeGenericType%2A>方法来创建新的泛型类型。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the invariant conditions for terms used in generic reflection, see the <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> property remarks.
trans-unit.target: 有关泛型反射中使用的术语的固定条件列表，请参阅 <xref:System.Type.IsGenericType%2A> 属性注解。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays information about a type, including whether or not it is a generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示信息的类型，包括是泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: Information is displayed for a constructed type, for its generic type definition, and for an ordinary type.
trans-unit.target: 构造类型、 其泛型类型定义，和普通类型，则会显示信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute" /> attribute applied, indicating that it was imported from a COM type library.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否应用了 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute" /> 属性，如果应用了该属性，则表示它是从 COM 类型库导入的。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> has a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 具有 <see cref="T:System.Type" />，则为 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性适用于从其构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int>` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>.`
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int>`(`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由 `MyGenericType<T>.`

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current type.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前类型进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is an instance of the current <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的对象是否是当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see langword="Type" /> is in the inheritance hierarchy of the object represented by <paramref name="o" />, or if the current <see langword="Type" /> is an interface that <paramref name="o" /> implements.
trans-unit.target: 如果满足下列任一条件，则为 <see langword="true" />：当前 <see langword="Type" /> 位于由 <paramref name="o" /> 表示的对象的继承层次结构中；当前 <see langword="Type" /> 是 <paramref name="o" /> 实现的接口。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if neither of these conditions is the case, if <paramref name="o" /> is <see langword="null" />, or if the current <see langword="Type" /> is an open generic type (that is, <see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> returns <see langword="true" />).
trans-unit.target: 如果不属于其中任一种情况，<paramref name="o" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，或者当前 <see langword="Type" /> 为开放式泛型类型（即 <see cref="P:System.Type.ContainsGenericParameters" /> 返回 <see langword="true" />），则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: A constructed type is not an instance of its generic type definition.
trans-unit.target: 构造的类型不是其泛型类型定义的实例。

trans-unit.source: That is, `MyGenericList<int>` (`MyGenericList(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic) is not an instance of `MyGenericList<T>` (`MyGenericList(Of T)` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 也就是说， `MyGenericList<int>` (`MyGenericList(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中) 不是实例的`MyGenericList<T>`(`MyGenericList(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the `IsInstanceOfType` method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 `IsInstanceOfType` 方法的用法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an interface; that is, not a class or a value type.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否是一个接口；即，不是类或值类型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is an interface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是接口，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ClassSemanticsMask> distinguishes a type declaration as class, interface or value type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ClassSemanticsMask>区分类型声明为类、 接口或值类型。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an interface, checks for the interface type, and indicates whether a class has the `IsInterface` property set.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个接口、 检查接口类型，并指示类是否具有`IsInterface`属性集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the fields of the current type are laid out sequentially, in the order that they were defined or emitted to the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 获取指示当前类型的字段是否按顺序（定义顺序或发送到元数据的顺序）放置的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" /> property of the current type includes <see cref="F:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前类型的 <see langword="true" /> 属性包括 <see cref="P:System.Type.Attributes" />，则为 <see cref="F:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 提供此属性是为方便起见。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.LayoutMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value to select the type layout attributes, and then test whether <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.LayoutMask?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举值，可以选择的类型布局属性，然后测试是否<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration values indicate the way the fields of the type are laid out in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.AutoLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.ExplicitLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>枚举值指示类型的字段在内存中布局的方式。

trans-unit.source: For dynamic types, you can specify <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType> when you create the type.
trans-unit.target: 对于动态类型，你可以指定<xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.SequentialLayout?displayProperty=nameWithType>创建类型时。

trans-unit.source: In code, apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute> attribute with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Sequential?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value to the type, to specify that layout is sequential.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，应用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>特性与<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Sequential?displayProperty=nameWithType>到的类型，以指定是按顺序进行该布局的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute> has been applied to a type.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A>方法来确定是否<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>应用于类型。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see section 9.1.2 of the specification for the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics".
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅部分 9.1.2 有关公共语言基础结构 (CLI) 文档，"第 ii 部分： 元数据定义和语义"的规范。

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a constructed generic type, this property applies to the generic type definition from which the type was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示构造的泛型类型，此属性适用于从其构造的类型的泛型类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the current <xref:System.Type> represents `MyGenericType<int>` (`MyGenericType(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), the value of this property is determined by `MyGenericType<T>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示`MyGenericType<int>`(`MyGenericType(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性的值由`MyGenericType<T>`。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter in the definition of a generic type or generic method, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示泛型类型或泛型方法定义中的类型参数，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of a class for which the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Sequential?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration value in the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute> class has been set, checks for the <xref:System.Type.IsLayoutSequential%2A> property, and displays the result.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一个类的实例为其<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.Sequential?displayProperty=nameWithType>中的枚举值<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StructLayoutAttribute>类已设置，检查<xref:System.Type.IsLayoutSequential%2A>属性，并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is marshaled by reference.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否按引用进行封送。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is marshaled by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是由引用封送的，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the `IsContextful`, <xref:System.Type.IsMarshalByRef%2A>, and <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Type> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示`IsContextful`， <xref:System.Type.IsMarshalByRef%2A>，和<xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A>属性<xref:System.Type>类。

trans-unit.source: It checks whether the given type can be hosted in the context, whether it can be marshaled by reference, and whether the type is a primitive data type.
trans-unit.target: 它会检查是否可以封送的引用，以及类型是否为基元数据类型，是否可以在上下文中中, 承载的给定的类型。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="P:System.Type.IsMarshalByRef" /> property and determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is marshaled by reference.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="P:System.Type.IsMarshalByRef" /> 属性并确定 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否按引用来进行封送。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is marshaled by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是由引用封送的，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines whether the given type is marshaled by reference and displays the result.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例确定给定的类型是否按引用进行封送，并显示结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current <see cref="T:System.Type" /> object represents a type whose definition is nested inside the definition of another type.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 对象是否表示其定义嵌套在另一个类型的定义之内的类型的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is nested inside another type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 嵌套在另一个类型内，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type.IsNested%2A> property returns `true` for all nested types, regardless of visibility.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.IsNested%2A>属性返回`true`所有嵌套类型，而不考虑可见性。

trans-unit.source: To test for nesting and visibility at the same time, use the related properties <xref:System.Type.IsNestedAssembly%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsNestedFamily%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsNestedFamANDAssem%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsNestedFamORAssem%2A>, <xref:System.Type.IsNestedPrivate%2A>, or <xref:System.Type.IsNestedPublic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在同一时间测试嵌套和可见性，请使用相关的属性<xref:System.Type.IsNestedAssembly%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsNestedFamily%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsNestedFamANDAssem%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsNestedFamORAssem%2A>， <xref:System.Type.IsNestedPrivate%2A>，或<xref:System.Type.IsNestedPublic%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask> enumeration member selects the visibility attributes for a type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask>枚举成员选择一种类型的可见性属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an outer class with a number of nested classes that have various types of visibility.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建了多个具有各种类型的可见性的嵌套类与某一外部类。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves the value of a number of visibility-related <xref:System.Type> properties for the parent type and each of its nested types.
trans-unit.target: 然后检索大量的可见性相关的值<xref:System.Type>父类型和每个及其嵌套类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is nested and visible only within its own assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否是嵌套的并且只能在它自己的程序集内可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is nested and visible only within its own assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是嵌套的并且仅在它自己的程序集中可见，则为 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter of a generic type, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> selects the visibility attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> 选择的可见性属性。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an outer class with a number of nested classes that have various types of visibility.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建了多个具有各种类型的可见性的嵌套类与某一外部类。

trans-unit.source: It then retrieves the value of a number of visibility-related <xref:System.Type> properties for the parent type and each of its nested types.
trans-unit.target: 然后检索大量的可见性相关的值<xref:System.Type>父类型和每个及其嵌套类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is nested and visible only to classes that belong to both its own family and its own assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否是嵌套的并且只对同时属于自己家族和自己程序集的类可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> is nested and visible only to classes that belong to both its own family and its own assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是嵌套的并且只对同时属于它自己的家族和它自己的程序集的类可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Type> represents a type parameter of a generic type, this property always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前<xref:System.Type>表示类型参数的泛型类型，此属性始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> selects the visibility attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.TypeAttributes.VisibilityMask?displayProperty=nameWithType> 选择的可见性属性。

trans-unit.source: The C# and Visual Basic languages do not include semantics that allow you to define a nested type that is visible only to protected types in its own assembly.
trans-unit.target: C# 和 Visual Basic 语言不包括允许你定义的嵌套的类型，仅对受保护的类型，在其自己的程序集中可见的语义。

trans-unit.source: `protected internal` visibility in C# and `Protected Friend` visibility in Visual Basic define a nested type that is visible both to protected types and to types in the same assembly.
trans-unit.target: `protected internal` 在 C# 中的可见性和`Protected Friend`在 Visual Basic 中的可见性定义的嵌套的类型，同时向受保护的类型和相同的程序集中的类型可见。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object's family is defined as all objects of the same <xref:System.Type> and of its subtypes.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>对象的系列指所有对象的相同<xref:System.Type>和子类型。

trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，通过该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 是否是嵌套的并且只能在它自己的家族内可见。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates why you cannot use `IsPublic` and `IsNotPublic` for nested classes.

trans-unit.source: For nested classes, ignore the results of `IsPublic` and `IsNotPublic` and pay attention only to the results of `IsNestedPublic` and `IsNestedPrivate`.
